source: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

reference: 早年，该节目仅在运营已久的互联网广播网站TogiNet Radio上播出，TogiNet Radio是一个专注于谈话广播的网站。
source: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.

reference: 2015 年年末， TogiNet 创建了 AstroNet 广播作为子电台。
source: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.

reference: 该节目最初由业余配音演员参演，范围从当地人到东德克萨斯州人。
source: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.

reference: 据报道，由于执法人员不在场，比什凯克街道上的大规模抢劫持续了一夜。
source: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.

reference: 一名观察者形容比什凯克（Bishkek）正在陷入“无政府“ 状态，成群的人们在街上游荡，掠夺商店里的消费品。
source: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.

reference: 几个比什凯克居民将这种违法状态归咎于来自南方的抗议者。
source: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.

reference: 在南非勒斯滕堡（Rustenburg）皇家巴福肯体育场举行的英式橄榄球联盟三国赛中，南非队击败了全黑队（新西兰）。
source: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.

reference: 最后结果是一分险胜，比分为 21 比 20，结束了全黑队连胜 15 场的局面。
source: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.

reference: 跳羚队以五连败收官。
source: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.

reference: 全黑队在两周前已经赢得了奖杯，而这场比赛是他们打的最后一场。
source: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.

reference: 该系列赛的最后一场比赛将于下周在约翰内斯堡 (Johannesburg) 的埃利斯公园举行，届时斯普林博克斯 (Springboks) 将迎战澳大利亚队。
source: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

reference: 周一晚 10：08，蒙大拿州西部发生中强地震。
source: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.

reference: 美国地质调查局 (USGS) 及美国国家地震信息中心目前还没有收到有关地震破坏的即时报告。
source: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.

reference: 这次地震的震中位于狄龙（Dillon）东北偏北 20 公里（15英里），比尤特（Butte）以南 65 公里处（40英里）。
source: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

reference: 周一，法国东部里昂附近的沼泽内发现了一只死野鸭。经证实，这只野鸭感染了对人类致命的 H5N1 型禽流感病毒。
source: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.

reference: 在奥地利、德国、斯洛文尼亚、保加利亚、希腊和意大利之后，法国是第七个深受这种病毒之苦的欧盟国家。
source: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.

reference: 克罗地亚和丹麦的 H5N1 疑似病例仍未确诊。
source: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

reference: 钱伯斯曾起诉上帝，称其应对“地球上数十亿居民中到处可见的死亡、破坏和恐怖”负责。
source: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."

reference: 钱伯斯是个不可知论者，他认为自己的诉讼是“随意的”，“任何人都可以起诉任何人”。
source: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."

reference: 卡米尔·圣桑 (Camille Saint-Saens) 创作的法国歌剧讲述的是一名艺术家的故事，“他一生沉迷于毒品和对日本的热爱”。
source: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."

reference: 结果，演员在舞台上吸食大麻，剧院本身也鼓励观众一起加入。
source: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.

reference: 前众议院议长纽特·金里奇、德克萨斯州州长里克·佩里和女国会议员米歇尔·巴赫曼最终分别名列第四、第五和第六。
source: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.

reference: 结果出来后，金里奇连连称赞桑托勒姆，但对罗姆尼做出严厉批评。以后者的名义，在爱荷华州放送对金里奇不利的竞选广告。
source: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.

reference: 佩里表示，他会“返回得克萨斯，评估今晚党团会议的结果，明确自己在这次较量中是否有胜算的余地”。但后来他又表示会继续参加竞选，并参加于 1 月 21 日在南卡罗莱纳州举行的初选。
source: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.

reference: 八月曾在埃姆斯模拟民意调查中胜出的巴赫曼决定退出竞选。
source: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.

reference: 这名摄影师被送往加州大学洛杉矶分校罗纳德·里根医疗中心，其后不治。
source: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.

reference: 报道称他年仅 20 多岁。比伯发表声明表示：“虽然我当时并不在场，也没有直接经历这起悲惨事故，但我仍为死者家属感到悲伤，为他们祈祷。”
source: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

reference: 娱乐新闻网站TMZ了解到，该名摄影师在Sepulveda大道的另一侧停车，开始拍摄警察的拦截，并在横穿马路后继续拍照，促使进行交通拦截的加州公路巡警两次停下手中工作，命令他回到对面。
source: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.

reference: 据警方称，撞倒摄影师的汽车司机未必会面临刑事指控。
source: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.

reference: 由于一天只颁发十八块奖牌，许多国家的运动员未能登上领奖台。
source: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.

reference: 与奖牌无缘的运动员包括荷兰的安娜·乔彻姆森，她在昨天的女子站姿超级大回转比赛中获得第九名，芬兰的卡特娅·萨里宁则在同一比赛中获得第十名。
source: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.

reference: 澳大利亚选手米切尔·古尔力获得男子站姿超级大回转比赛第十一名。捷克选手奥德里奇·耶利内克获得男子坐姿超级大回转比赛第十六名。
source: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.

reference: 墨西哥选手拉利·委拉斯开兹在男子坐姿超级大回转比赛中获得第 15 名的成绩。新西兰选手亚当·霍尔在男子站姿超级大回转比赛中获得第 9 名的成绩。
source: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.

reference: 波兰男子视障滑雪选手马切吉·克雷泽尔（Maciej Krezel ）和向导安娜·奥加津斯卡（Anna Ogarzynska）在超级大回转比赛中获得第十三名，韩国选手朴钟硕（Jong Seork Park）在男子坐式超级大回转比赛中获得第二十四名。
source: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

reference: 联合国维和人员在 2010 年地震后抵达海地，他们因疫情蔓延而受到指责。疫情是从部队营地附近开始扩散的。
source: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.

reference: 诉讼材料显示，联合国营地未能对废弃物进行适当的消毒处理，因而导致细菌进入阿蒂博尼特河的支流，这是海地最大河流之一。
source: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.

reference: 在军队到来之前，海地自 19 世纪初以来从未遇到过与该疾病有关的问题。
source: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.

reference: 海地正义与民主研究所 (Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy) 引用的独立研究表明，是尼泊尔的联合国维和部队在不知情的情况下将这种疾病带到了海地。
source: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.

reference: 研究该疾病的联合国专家丹妮尔·拉塔涅 (Danielle Lantagne) 表示，疫情爆发很可能是由维和人员引起的。
source: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

reference: 汉密尔顿（Hamilton）确认，霍华德大学医院收治的病人情况稳定。
source: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.

reference: 这名患者曾去过尼日利亚，当地曾出现数宗埃博拉病毒的病例。
source: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.

reference: 医院遵循了感染控制规定，包括把患者与他人隔离，以防感染到其他人。
source: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

reference: 在出演《辛普森一家》前，西蒙曾在几个节目中担任过多种职位。
source: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.

reference: 20 世纪 80 年代，他在《出租车》、《欢呼》以及《特蕾西·厄尔曼秀》等节目工作。
source: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.

reference: 1989 年，他与布鲁克斯和格罗宁一起创作了《辛普森一家》，并负责聘请了该剧的首支编剧团队。
source: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.

reference: 尽管他在 1993 年离开了节目，但他保留了执行制片人的头衔，并持续获得每季数千万美元的版税。
source: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

reference: 早些时候，中国通讯社新华社报道了一架飞机已被劫持的新闻。
source: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.

reference: 随后的报道称，这架飞机受到炸弹威胁，被迫返回阿富汗，降落在坎大哈。
source: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.

reference: 早些时候的报道称，这架飞机被拒绝在乌鲁木齐紧急降落后，已返回阿富汗。
source: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

reference: 空难在伊朗是司空见惯的事，这个国家的民用和军用飞机都已经老化，缺少维护。
source: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.

reference: 在国际制裁下，伊朗无法购买新的飞机。
source: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.

reference: 本周早些时候，一架警用直升机坠毁，事件造成 3 人死亡，3 人受伤。
source: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.

reference: 上个月，伊朗一架飞往亚美尼亚的客机坠毁，机上 168 人遇难，这是伊朗多年来最惨烈的一起空难。
source: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.

reference: 同一个月，又有一架客机冲出马什哈德的跑道，撞上一堵墙，造成 17 人死亡。
source: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

reference: 空中铁匠乐队已经取消了他们巡回演唱会的剩余场次。
source: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.

reference: 这支摇滚乐队原定在美国和加拿大巡演，一直持续到 9 月 16 日。
source: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.

reference: 主唱史蒂芬·泰勒在 8 月 5 日的演出中从舞台跌落受伤，随后乐队取消了这次巡演。
source: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.

reference: 双方都保住了各自的每个发球局，之后穆雷在抢七局中输掉了第一盘。
source: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.

reference: 德尔·波特罗（Del Potro）在第二盘刚开局时就占上风，但在比分达到 6-6 后就得进行抢七大战。
source: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.

reference: 此时波特罗接受了肩膀治疗，但仍坚持继续比赛。
source: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

reference: 节目于当地时间晚上 8:30 (15.00 UTC) 开始。
source: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).

reference: 全国各地的著名歌手都唱祈祷歌献给 Shri Shyam。
source: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.

reference: 当晚由歌手桑朱·沙玛（Sanju Sharma）开场演出，随后是贾伊·尚卡尔·乔杜里 （Jai Shankar Choudhary）出场。也演唱了 chhappan bhog 祈祷歌。歌手拉朱·坎戴尔瓦尔（Raju Khandelwal） 同他一起进行了表演。
source: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

reference: 然后，拉卡·辛格带头唱了拜赞歌。
source: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.

reference: 108 碟珍馐奉纳（Chhappan Bhog）（在印度教中，Chhappan Bhog 指供奉神灵的56 种不同食物，其中包括糖果、水果、坚果、菜品等物）供奉给 Baba Shyam。
source: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.

reference: 拉卡·辛格 (Lakkha Singh) 还介绍了 chhappan bhog bhajan。歌手 Raju Khandelwal 陪同他身边。
source: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

reference: 在周四的东京电玩展上，任天堂总裁岩田聪发表主题演讲，公布了公司新一代任天堂 Revolution 游戏主机控制器的设计。
source: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.

reference: 该控制器类似于电视遥控器，使用放置在用户电视机附近的两个传感器来对其在三维空间中的位置进行三角测量。
source: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.

reference: 它让玩家可以通过在空中移动设备来控制电子游戏中的运动和操作。
source: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

reference: 詹卡洛·费斯切拉因失去了对赛车的把控，在比赛开始后不久就退出了。
source: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.

reference: 他的队友费尔南多·阿隆索（Fernando Alonso）在比赛中的绝大多数时间里都处于领先地位，但却在进站后就退出了比赛，大概是因为其右前轮实在塞得厉害。
source: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.

reference: 迈克尔·舒马赫在阿隆索退赛后不久也退出了比赛，因为在比赛的多次竞逐中，悬架受到了损伤。
source: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

reference: 根据新闻发布会的记录文字，他曾说过：”她很可爱，唱得也很好。”
source: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.

reference: “每次我们排练这场表演的时候，我都很感动，打心眼里感动。”
source: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."

reference: 发射大约 3 分钟后，箭载摄像机显示大量绝缘泡沫碎片从燃料箱脱落。
source: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.

reference: 然而，这些泡沫被认为并没有对航天飞机造成任何损坏。
source: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.

reference: 美国宇航局的航天飞机项目负责人 N. Wayne Hale Jr. 表示，泡沫是“经受住了我们担心的时长之后”才掉落的。
source: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."

reference: 表演开始五分钟后，刮起了风，约一分钟后，风速达到了 70 公里/小时……紧接着又下起了雨，雨势如此之大，像针扎一样拍打在皮肤上，随后天上下起了冰雹，惊慌失措的人群尖叫着四散奔逃。
source: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.

reference: “我姐姐和她的朋友不见了，路上有两个残疾人坐着轮椅，有人跳过去帮他们推轮椅”，阿尔芒·范思哲说道。
source: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.

reference: 日本广播协会 (NHK) 还报道说，位于新泻县的柏崎刈羽 (Kashiwazaki Kariwa) 核电站运行正常。
source: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.

reference: 北陆电力株式会社报道称，志贺核能发电厂 1 号和 2 号反应堆已经关闭，地震并未造成影响。
source: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.

reference: 据报道，该地区约有 9400 户家庭断水，大约 100 户断电。
source: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.

reference: 一些道路受到了损坏，受影响地区的铁路服务中断，石川（Ishikawa）县的能登机场仍然处于关闭状态。
source: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

reference: 一枚炸弹在总督办公室外爆炸。
source: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.

reference: 两小时内，政府大楼附近又发生了三起炸弹爆炸事件。
source: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.

reference: 一些报道称官方宣布的死亡人数为 8 人，而据官方报道证实，有多达 30 人受伤；但是最终的数字尚未确定。
source: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

reference: 在食用受污染宠物食品后死亡的宠物的尿样中，均发现了氰尿酸和三聚氰胺。
source: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.

reference: 该大学的研究人员表示，这两种化合物相互作用形成的晶体可能会造成肾脏功能障碍。
source: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.

reference: 研究人员观察到，在添加三聚氰胺和三聚氰尿酸后，猫的尿液中形成了结晶。
source: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.

reference: 通过红外光谱 (FTIR) 进行比较后发现，这些结晶的成分与在受影响宠物的尿液中发现的结晶成分吻合。
source: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

reference: 我不知道你有没有意识到，从中美洲进口到这个国家的大部分货物都是免关税的。
source: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.

reference: 然而，我们百分之八十的商品在中美洲国家被征收关税。……我们对待你。
source: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.

reference: 我觉得这毫无道理；显然不公平。
source: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.

reference: 我对人们说的是：我们怎么对待你，你就怎么对待我们。
source: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.

reference: 加利福尼亚州长阿诺德·施瓦辛格签署了一项法案，禁止向未成年人出售或出租暴力电子游戏。
source: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.

reference: 该法案规定在加州销售的暴力电子游戏必须贴上“18”的标签，销售商每违法销售给未成年人一次就会被处以 1000 美元的罚款。
source: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.

reference: 总检察长兼王室法律顾问凯尔·斯塔莫 (Kier Starmer) 今天上午发表声明，宣布对胡纳和普莱斯提起公诉。
source: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.

reference: 胡纳已经辞职，他在内阁中的位置将由国会议员埃德·戴维 (Ed Davey) 接替。预计国会议员诺曼·兰姆 (Norman Lamb) 将接替戴维空出的商务部长一职。
source: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.

reference: 胡纳和普赖斯将于 2 月 16 日在威斯敏斯特治安法院出庭。
source: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

reference: 遇难者分别是 25 岁的尼古拉斯·奥尔登 (Nicholas Alden) 和 21 岁的扎卡里·卡德巴克 (Zachary Cuddeback)。当时驾车的是卡德巴克。
source: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.

reference: 埃德加·贝吉利亚 (Edgar Veguilla) 的手臂和下巴受伤，而克里斯托弗· 施耐德 (Kristoffer Schneider) 则需要做脸部重建手术。
source: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.

reference: 乌卡 (Uka) 的武器在指着第五个人的头时失灵了。施耐德（Schneider）疼痛不已，一只眼睛失明，一块头骨缺失，利用钛板才重塑了脸部。
source: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.

reference: 施耐德 (Schneider) 在其祖国的美国空军 (USAF) 基地通过视频连线进行作证。
source: Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

reference: 除了周三的比赛，卡帕内多（Carpanedo）还参加了锦标赛的两项个人竞赛。
source: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.

reference: 她的第一个项目是障碍滑雪，并在第一回合以“未完成”的成绩结束比赛。该比赛 116 名参赛者中有 36 人取得了相同的成绩。
source: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.

reference: 她的另一项比赛是大回转，在女子站姿组中以 4:41.30 分钟的总成绩名列第十，比排名第一的奥地利选手克劳迪娅·罗什慢了 2:11.60 分钟，比排名第九的匈牙利选手巩基·达尼慢了 1:09.02 分钟。
source: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.

reference: 女子坐式组的四名滑雪选手未能完赛，大回转项目（Giant Slalom）的 117 名选手中有 45 人未能挤进榜单。
source: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

reference: 中央邦警方追回了被盗的笔记本电脑和手机。
source: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.

reference: 副总警监埃利亚（D K Arya）称：“我们逮捕了 5 名强奸这位瑞士妇女的人，并找到了她的手机和笔记本电脑。”
source: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".

reference: 被告的姓名分别是 Baba Kanjar、Bhutha Kanjar、Rampro Kanjar、Gaza Kanjar 和 Vishnu Kanjar。
source: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.

reference: 警察局长钱德拉·谢卡尔·索兰基说，被告人出庭时都蒙住了脸。
source: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.

reference: 虽然车撞到房子时，房子里面有三个人，但最后并没有人受伤。
source: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.

reference: 然而，司机的头部受到了重创。
source: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.

reference: 事故发生的道路暂时封闭，紧急救援人员将司机从红色奥迪 TT 中救了出来。
source: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT.

reference: 起初，他被送往位于大雅茅斯的詹姆斯·佩吉特医院进行救治。
source: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.

reference: 他随后被转送到剑桥的阿登布鲁克医院。
source: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

reference: 此后，阿德克雅被控谋杀她的儿子，于爱丁堡治安法庭受审。
source: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.

reference: 她被拘留，等待起诉和审判；但是任何目击者的证据都可能受到负面影响，因为她的形象已被广泛发布。
source: She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published.

reference: 这在英国的其他地方是常见做法，但苏格兰的司法制度有所不同，法院认为公布照片可能会造成潜在的危害。
source: This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial.

reference: 邓迪大学（University of Dundee）的 Pamela Ferguson 教授指出：“记者如果公布嫌疑人的照片等信息的话，似乎确实存在危害性。”
source: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."

reference: 起诉的主要负责部门皇家检控署向记者表示，至少在提起公诉之前将不会再发表进一步言论。
source: Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment.

reference: 据透露，这份文件将提及边界争端，巴勒斯坦希望以1967年中东战争前的边界为基础。
source: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.

reference: 据报道，讨论的其他议题包括对两国来说都神圣的耶路撒冷的未来状态和约旦河谷问题。
source: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.

reference: 以色列要求协议签订后，在山谷中部署十年的军事力量，而巴勒斯坦民族权力机构只同意保留五年。
source: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

reference: 护林员会密切监督参加虫害防治补充试验的射手，因为试验会受到监测，并会评估其效果。
source: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.

reference: 在国家公园野生动物管理局（NPWS）和澳大利亚射击运动员协会（NSW）的合作中，射击运动员协会为狩猎计划招募了合格的志愿者。
source: In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program.

reference: 澳大利亚新州国家公园和野生动物服务中心（NPWS）保护和遗产管理处代理主任米克·奥弗林（Mick O’flynn）表示：选中参与第一次射击行动的四名枪手均已接受全面的安全及培训指导。
source: According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

reference: 昨天，马尔泰利在由 9 名成员组成的新临时选举委员会 (CEP)中宣誓就职。
source: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday.

reference: 这是马特利 (Martelly) 四年来第五次入选海地临时选举委员会 (CEP)。
source: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years.

reference: 上个月，总统委员会建议前任 CEP 辞职，这是推动国家走向新选举措施的一部分。
source: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.

reference: 该委员会是马尔泰利 (Martelly) 对始于 10 月份的大规模反政府抗议活动做出的回应。
source: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.

reference: 自 2011 年以来，由于一些选举未能如期举行而引发了这些抗议活动，有时抗议还会升级为暴力事件。
source: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

reference: 据报道，大约有 60 起 iPod 发生故障、机身过热的情况，共造成 6 起火灾，4 人轻微烧伤。
source: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.

reference: 日本经济产业省 (METI) 表示，他们已经注意到有 27 起事故与该设备有关。
source: Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices.

reference: 上周，日本经济产业省 (METI) 宣布，苹果公司向该部门通报另外 34 起过热造成的事故，尽管该公司称这些事故“并不严重”。
source: Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "non-serious."

reference: 经济产业省回应称，苹果推迟发布报告“非常令人遗憾”。
source: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."

reference: 马里亚纳群岛于当地时间早上 7 点 19 分（格林尼治时间周五晚上 9 点 19 分）发生地震。
source: The eathquake struck Mariana at 07:19 a.m. local time (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).

reference: 北马里亚纳应急管理办公室表示，据报告国内没有造成灾害损失。
source: The Northern Marianas emergency management office said that there were no damages reported in the nation.

reference: 而且太平洋海啸预警中心（Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center）也表示并未发现海啸迹象。
source: Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said that there was no Tsunami indication.

reference: 菲律宾一名前警察在首都马尼拉劫持旅游大巴，将车上的香港游客作为人质。
source: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines.

reference: 罗兰多·门多萨 (Rolando Mendoza) 架起他的 M16 步枪对游客扫射。
source: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.

reference: 多名人质获救，目前至少有六名人质确认遇难。
source: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far.

reference: 六名人质（包括儿童和老人在内）以及那些菲律宾摄影师被提前释放。
source: Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers.

reference: 两位摄影师其后顶替一位需要上洗手间的老妇。门多萨则被击毙。
source: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

reference: 利金斯 (Liggins) 追随父亲的脚步，开始了从医生涯。
source: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.

reference: 他接受过产科医生培训，从 1959 年开始在奥克兰国家妇女医院工作。
source: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959.

reference: 利金斯 (Liggins) 在医院工作时，开始在业余时间研究早产。
source: While he was working at the hospital Liggins began to investigate premature labor during his spare time.

reference: 他的研究表明，施用激素可加速宝宝胎肺的成熟。
source: His research showed that if a hormone was administered it would speed up the baby's foetal lung maturation.

reference: 新华社报道称，政府调查人员周三发现了两个“黑匣子”飞行记录仪。
source: Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday.

reference: 其他摔跤选手也纷纷悼念露娜 (Luna) 。
source: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.

reference: 汤米·追梦儿说：“露娜是首位至尊女王，我的第一任经理人。露娜在双月之夜去世。这样的夜晚就像她本人一样特别。她是个坚强的女人。”
source: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."

reference: 达斯汀·鲁内尔斯（Dustin Runnels，外号“金沙”）评论说：“卢娜和我一样难以捉摸……她可能要更难摸透……我爱她，也会想她……希望她去到了更好的地方。”
source: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."

reference: 在 2010 年联邦大选之前曾对 1,400 名受访者做过调查，受访者中反对澳大利亚成为共和国的人数自 2008 年以来增长了 8%。
source: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008.

reference: 看守总理朱莉娅·吉拉德在2010年联邦大选竞选期间称，她认为在女王伊丽莎白二世退位后，澳大利亚应该成为共和国。
source: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.

reference: 34% 的受访者一致表示，希望英国女王伊丽莎白二世成为澳大利亚的最后一任君主。
source: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.

reference: 投票存在两极分化的情况，29% 的受访者认为澳大利亚应该尽快成立共和国，31% 的人则认为澳大利亚永远不应该成立共和国。
source: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

reference: 这位奥运会金牌得主本应参加 100 米和 200 米自由泳和英联邦运动会的三项接力赛，但由于他的抱怨，他的健康状况一直受到质疑。
source: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.

reference: 他一直无法用药物来缓解疼痛，因为比赛禁止参赛者服用这些药物。
source: He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

reference: 中央密苏里大学 (University of Central Missouri) 的数学家、计算机科学教授柯蒂斯·库珀 (Curtis Cooper) 于 1 月 25 日发现了迄今为止最大的已知素数。
source: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.

reference: 二月初，几个人用不同的硬件和软件验证了这一发现，并在周二宣布。
source: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.

reference: 彗星可能是地球上的水和有机物的来源，这些有机物可以形成蛋白质并维持生命的存续。
source: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.

reference: 科学家希望了解自从彗星很久以前与地球相撞以来，行星是如何形成的，尤其是地球的形成方式。
source: Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

reference: 现年 53 岁的库莫（Cuomo）从今年年初开始担任州长，并于上个月签署了一项将同性婚姻合法化的法案。
source: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.

reference: 他把谣言称为“政治碎碎念和愚蠢行为”。
source: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".

reference: 据推测，他将在 2016 年参加总统竞选。
source: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.

reference: 美国联邦航空局 (FAA) 称，新一代航空运输系统 (NextGen) 可以使飞机缩短飞行航线，每年节省数百万加仑的燃料，并减少碳排放。
source: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.

reference: 它使用卫星技术，而不是老旧的地面雷达技术，使空中交通管制员能够更精确地定位飞机，并向飞行员提供更准确的信息。
source: It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

reference: 没有增设额外的交通工具，地上火车在温布利 (Wembley) 也不停站，地上也没有停车场和停车换乘设施。
source: No extra transport is being put on and overground trains will not stop at Wembley, and car parking and park-and-ride facilities are unavailable at the ground.

reference: 由于担心缺乏交通工具，比赛可能会被迫在没有球队支持者的情况下闭门进行。
source: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.

reference: 周四，一份发表于《科学》杂志的研究报告称，一种新的鸟类在厄瓜多尔加拉帕戈斯群岛形成。
source: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.

reference: 来自美国普林斯顿大学和瑞典乌普萨拉大学的研究人员报告称，由于当地特有的达尔文雀中的勇地雀和外来的仙人掌大嘴地雀之间的繁殖，这个新物种只进化了两代，尽管人们认为这一过程需要更长的时间。
source: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

reference: 黄金可以加工成各种形状。可以卷曲成微小的形状。
source: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.

reference: 它可以拉成细丝，用于缠绕和编结。也可以捶打或碾成片状。
source: It can be pulled into thin wire, which can be twisted and plaited. It can be hammered or rolled into sheets.

reference: 它可以做得很薄，粘在其他金属上，由于达到如此之薄，有时可以用于装饰被称为“彩饰手抄本”的书本里的手绘图画。
source: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".

reference: 这被称为化学物质的 pH 值。你可以使用红甘蓝汁制作指示剂。
source: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice.

reference: 卷心菜汁的颜色将根据化学物质的酸碱性发生变化。
source: The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is.

reference: pH 值以被测化学品中的氢（pH 中的 H）离子数量表示。
source: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical.

reference: 氢离子是失去了电子的质子（因为氢原子由一个质子和一个电子组成）。
source: Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).

reference: 搅动两种干粉使其混合，然后用干净的湿手把它们揉成一个球。
source: Swirl the two dry powders together and then, with clean wet hands, squeeze them into a ball.

reference: 你手上的水分会与外层发生反应，这样会形成一层类似外壳的东西，感觉十分有趣。
source: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.

reference: 哈拉帕 (Harappa) 和摩亨佐-达罗 (Mohenjo-daro) 这两个城市几乎每家每户都有抽水马桶，这些马桶与精密的污水处理系统相连。
source: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.

reference: 在希腊克里特岛和圣托里尼米诺斯城市的房屋中发现了污水系统的遗迹。
source: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.

reference: 古埃及、波斯和中国也有厕所。在罗马文明中，厕所有时是男女混合的公共浴室的一部分。
source: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

reference: 你给远在千里之外的人打电话，就会用到卫星。
source: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.

reference: 太空中的卫星接到电话后，几乎是立刻将其反射回去。
source: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.

reference: 卫星是由火箭发射到太空的。科学家在太空中使用望远镜是因为地球的大气层让某些光线和视野产生扭曲。
source: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.

reference: 要把卫星或望远镜送入太空，需要一枚超过 100 英尺高的巨型火箭。
source: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.

reference: 车轮以不可思议的方式改变了世界。车轮对我们最大的贡献，是让我们的交通更加便捷。
source: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.

reference: 有了它，我们才有了火车、汽车和许多其他交通工具。
source: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.

reference: 它们的下方是更多中等大小的猫科动物，它们吃的是中等大小的猎物，从兔子、羚羊到鹿都会吃。
source: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.

reference: 最终，有许多小型的猫科动物（包括散养的宠物猫），以昆虫、啮齿动物、蜥蜴和鸟类等数量多得多的小型猎物为食。
source: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.

reference: 它们成功的秘诀是利基概念，每只猫都负责一项特殊的工作，防止它们与其他猫竞争。
source: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.

reference: 狮子是群居属性最明显的猫科动物，生活在称为狮群的大型群体中。
source: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.

reference: 狮群由一到三只有亲属关系的成年雄性，以及可多达三十只的雌性和幼崽组成。
source: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.

reference: 作为大家庭里的姐妹和女儿，雌性之间通常彼此关系密切。
source: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.

reference: 狮群的行为与狼群或狗群非常类似。这些动物与狮子的行为惊人地相似（但与其他大型猫科动物不同），而且这些行为对它们的猎物来说也是非常致命的。
source: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.

reference: 老虎是全能运动员，它会攀爬（虽然攀爬能力不是很强）、游泳、跳远，拉力能达到人类大力士的五倍。
source: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.

reference: 老虎与狮、豹和美洲虎属于同一类型（豹属）。这四种大猫是仅有的会吼叫的猫科动物。
source: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.

reference: 老虎的咆哮不像狮子的咆哮那样深沉，而更像一句生气嘶吼的话语。
source: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.

reference: 豹猫喜欢吃小动物。如果条件允许，他们会捕捉猴子、蛇、啮齿动物和鸟类。豹猫的猎物几乎都比自身要小得多。
source: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.

reference: 科学家认为，美洲豹猫是通过气味和嗅探猎物在地面上的踪迹来跟踪和寻找要捕食的动物的。
source: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.

reference: 它们的夜视能力很强，能在黑暗中看得很清楚，而且行动也很隐秘。豹猫的捕食方式是先融入周围环境，然后猛扑向猎物。
source: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.

reference: 当一小群生物（一个小种群）与它们本来的主要种群分离时（比如它们跨过山脉和河流，或者它们到了一个新的岛屿以至于不可能轻易回去)，它们通常会发现自己所处的环境与之前不同。
source: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.

reference: 这个新的环境有不同的资源和不同的竞争对手，所以新的种群将需要不同的特征或适应能力来成为一个强有力的竞争对手，而不是它们之前所需要的那些。
source: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.

reference: 原来的种群根本没有改变，它们仍需要和以前一样适应环境。
source: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before.

reference: 随着时间的推移，新的种群开始适应新的环境，它们开始变得与其他种群越来越不相似了。
source: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.

reference: 在历经数千甚至数百万年以后，这两个种群最终看上去会截然不同，以致于不能将两者称作同一物种。
source: Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species.

reference: 我们把这个过程称为“物种形成”，也就是新物种的形成。物种形成是进化的必然结果，也是进化中极为重要的一环。
source: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

reference: 植物能制造人类吸入的氧气，吸收人类呼出的二氧化碳。
source: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).

reference: 植物通过光合作用从阳光中获取养分。它们还能提供荫凉。
source: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.

reference: 我们用植物做房子，用植物做衣服。我们吃的大部分食物都是植物。没有植物，动物就不能生存。
source: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.

reference: 沧龙是那个时代的顶级掠食者，除了同类它什么都不怕。
source: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.

reference: 它的长下颚上布满了 70 多颗剃刀般锋利的牙齿，上颚上还有一排。这意味着任何与它相遇的东西都无路可逃。
source: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.

reference: 它的舌头有可能是分叉的，对此我们尚不确定。它的食物包括海龟、大型鱼类、其他沧龙，甚至会吃人。
source: We don't know for sure, but it may have had a forked tongue. Its diet included turtles, large fish, other mosasaurs, and it may even have been a cannibal.

reference: 它会攻击任何进入水中的东西；即使像霸王龙之类的巨型恐龙也不是它的对手。
source: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.

reference: 尽管罗马人的大部分食物是我们所常见的，但他们确实有一些奇怪或不寻常的宴会菜肴，包括野猪、孔雀、蜗牛和一种叫做榛睡鼠的啮齿动物
source: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse

reference: 另一个不同之处在于，穷人和女人坐在椅子上吃饭，富人则喜欢聚在一起举行宴会，侧卧着吃饭。
source: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.

reference: 几个世纪后从美洲或亚洲传入欧洲的食物不可能出现在古罗马人的饮食当中。
source: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.

reference: 例如，他们没有玉米、西红柿、土豆和可可，也没有哪个古罗马人吃过火鸡。
source: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.

reference: 巴比伦人为他们每位神祇都建造了一座主殿，将其视为该神居所。
source: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.

reference: 人们会把祭品献给神，牧师会通过仪式和节庆来满足神的需要。
source: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.

reference: 每所神殿都有一处对外开放的庭院，以及一处只有祭司才能进入的内殿。
source: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.

reference: 有些特殊的塔呈金字塔形状，被称为金字形神塔，是作为庙宇的一部分而建造的。
source: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.

reference: 塔顶是上帝的特殊圣地。
source: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.

reference: 在中东温暖的气候中，房子并不是多重要。
source: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.

reference: 希伯来家庭的生活大多是在户外度过的。
source: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air.

reference: 女人们在院子里做饭；商店其实就是面向街道的开放柜台。他们用石头来建造房屋。
source: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.

reference: 迦南没有大森林，所以木材非常昂贵。
source: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.

reference: 格陵兰岛人烟稀少。据北欧史诗萨迦记载，红胡子埃里克因犯谋杀罪被逐出冰岛，他向西航行，发现陆地，于是将其命名为格陵兰岛。
source: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.

reference: 但不管他有没有发现，爱斯基摩人当时已经在那里生活了。
source: But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time.

reference: 虽然均隶属于“斯堪的纳维亚”，但丹麦、瑞典、挪威和冰岛的民众、国王、习俗和历史之间存在着许多差异。
source: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.

reference: 如果你看过电影《国家宝藏》，你可能会以为《独立宣言》背面会画着一份藏宝图。
source: If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence.

reference: 然而事实并非如此。虽然这份文件的背面写了一些东西，但并是不一份藏宝图。
source: However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map.

reference: 《独立宣言》背面写着“Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776（《独立宣言》原件，1776 年 7 月 4 日）”的字样。文字写在文件底部，是倒过来的。
source: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.

reference: 虽然没有人能确定作者是谁，但这个大型羊皮纸文档（尺寸为 29¾ 英寸乘以 24½ 英寸）据称在刚写成的时候是卷起来存放的。
source: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.

reference: 因此，很可能这个符号只是作为一个标签添加的。
source: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.

reference: 诺曼底登陆和随后的战斗解放了法国北部，但南部仍然没有解放。
source: The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free.

reference: 它由“维希”法国人统治。这些法国人在 1940 年与德国人达成了和平协议，不反抗侵略者，而是和他们合作。
source: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them.

reference: 1940 年 8 月 15 日，盟军攻入法国南部，这次进攻被称为“龙骑兵行动”。
source: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".

reference: 仅仅两个星期，美国和自由法国的军队就解放了法国南部，并转向德国。
source: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.

reference: 文明是一种由共同生活、合作工作的人群（社会）所共享的单一文化。
source: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society.

reference: “文明”一词来自拉丁语“civilis”（意为“公民的”），与拉丁语"civis"（意为“公民”）及"civitas"（意为“城市”或“城邦”）都有关，这也以某种方式定义了社会的规模。
source: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.

reference: 城邦是民族的前身。文明型文化意味着知识的代代相传，文化的足迹萦绕留存，还有文化能够公平地传播。
source: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.

reference: 少数民族文化常常没有留下相关的历史证据就消失无踪，而且不被当做是像样的文明。
source: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.

reference: 在独立战争期间，十三个州最初根据《联邦条例》组成了弱小的中央政府（国会是其唯一的组成部分）。
source: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.

reference: 国会没有征税的权力，而且因为没有国家行政部门或司法部门，国会只能依赖州政府执行所有法案，而州政府又经常不配合。
source: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.

reference: 它也没有权力推翻各州之间的税法和关税。
source: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.

reference: 这些条款必须得到所有州的一致同意才能进行修改，而各州对待中央政府的态度十分轻慢，以至于其州立代表经常缺席。
source: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

reference: 意大利国家足球队和德国国家足球队都是世界上第二成功的球队，在 2006 年拿下了足球世界杯冠军。
source: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.

reference: 流行的运动项目包括足球、篮球、排球、水球、击剑、橄榄球、自行车、冰球、轮滑曲棍球和一级方程式赛车。
source: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.

reference: 冬季运动在北部地区最受欢迎，意大利人会在那里参加国际比赛和奥运会比赛。
source: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.

reference: 日本拥有近 7000 个岛屿（最大的是本州岛），这让日本成为了世界第七大岛国！
source: Japans holds nearly 7,000 islands (the biggest being Honshu), making Japan the 7th largest island in the world!

reference: 由于日本的岛屿群众多，日本从地质学角度上常被称为“列岛”
source: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago"

reference: 西方对台湾的了解可以追溯到 15 世纪。当时路过的欧洲水手将该岛命名为“福尔摩沙岛”(Ilha Formosa)，意思是美丽的岛屿。
source: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.

reference: 1624 年，荷兰东印度公司在台湾地区西南部建立基地，开始改变原住民的粮食生产方式，并雇佣华工在其水稻和蔗糖种植园工作。
source: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.

reference: 1683 年，清朝（1644年 - 1912年）军队控制了台湾西部和北部沿海地区，1885 年，大清帝国宣布在台湾建省。
source: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.

reference: 1895 年，在甲午战争 (1894-1895 年) 中战败后，清政府签署了《马关条约》，将台湾的主权割让给日本，日本统治台湾直至 1945 年。
source: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

reference: 马丘比丘古城由三座主要建筑物组成，分别是拴日石 (Intihuatana)、太阳神庙和三窗之屋。
source: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.

reference: 为了让游客更好地了解建筑群的原貌，该建筑群边缘的大部分建筑都经过重建。
source: Most of the buildings on the edges of the complex have been rebuilt in order to give tourists a better idea of how they originally appeared.

reference: 到 1976 年，马丘比丘的百分之三十得到修复，修复工作一直持续到今天。
source: By 1976, thirty percent of Machu Picchu had been restored and restoration continues till today.

reference: 例如，世界上最常见的静态图像摄影格式是 35mm 格式，这是胶片电影时代末期占主导地位的电影尺寸。
source: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.

reference: 时至今日仍有生产，但更重要的是它的长宽比应用到了数码相机图像传感器的格式上。
source: It is still produced today, but more importantly its aspect ratio has been inherited by digital camera image sensor formats.

reference: 35 毫米格式的实际尺寸是 36 毫米宽，24 毫米高，这样格式其实有点令人困惑。
source: The 35mm format is actually, somewhat confusingly, 36mm in width by 24mm in height.

reference: 因此，这种格式的宽高比（除以 12 得到最简单的整数比）便是 3:2。
source: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.

reference: 许多常见格式（例如 APS 格式系列）都与这个长宽比相同或相当接近。
source: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.

reference: 经常被滥用和嘲笑的三分法，在创造动态时不失为一种简单的指导方法，还能让图像保持有序。
source: The much-abused and often-ridiculed rule of thirds is a simple guideline creating dynamism while keeping a measure of order in an image.

reference: 它指出，对主体来说最有效的位置是将图像垂直和水平分为三部分的线的交叉点（见示例）。
source: It states that the most effective place for the main subject is at the intersection of lines dividing the image into thirds vertically and horizontally (see example).

reference: 在欧洲历史上的这段时期，已然富有而强大起来的天主教会受到了密切监督。
source: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny.

reference: 尽管欧洲各国语言和习俗各不相同，但一千多年来，基督教把它们联系在了一起。
source: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I

reference: 从国王到平民，它遍布十方的力量影响着每一个人。
source: Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner.

reference: 基督教的主要信条之一是财富应该用来减轻痛苦和贫困，而教会的货币基金就是专门为此而设立的。
source: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.

reference: 教会中央集权制在罗马存在了一千多年，这种权力和金钱的集中让许多人开始质疑，他们是否遵守了这一信条。
source: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.

reference: 敌对行动爆发后不久，英国开始对德国实施海上封锁。
source: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany.

reference: 他们切断了生死攸关的军事和民用物资供应。事实证明这一战略是有效的，尽管这样的封锁违反了在过去的两个世纪里，根据几项国际协定制定的已为大家普遍接受的国际法。
source: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.

reference: 英国在国际水域布雷，防止任何船只进入整片海域，甚至对中立国船只也构成威胁。
source: Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships.

reference: 因为对这一战略的响应有限，德国期望其无限制潜艇战也能有类似的响应。
source: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.

reference: 在 20 世纪 20 年代，大多市民的主流态度是和平主义的、分离主义的。
source: During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation.

reference: 目睹第一次世界大战中的肆虐残暴后，各国都渴望避免重蹈覆辙。
source: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future.

reference: 1884 年，特斯拉搬到了美国，接受了纽约市爱迪生公司的一份工作。
source: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.

reference: 他在抵达美国时，身上带着 4 美分、一本诗集，还有一封查尔斯•巴舍勒（Charles Batchelor）（他前份工作的经理）写给托马斯•爱迪生（Thomas Edison）的推荐信。
source: He arrived in the US with 4 cents to his name, a book of poetry, and a letter of recommendation from Charles Batchelor (his manager in his previous job) to Thomas Edison.

reference: 中国古代的不同时期各有特点；中国的每个时期或每个执掌天下的家族都是一个特点鲜明的王朝。
source: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.

reference: 同样，历朝历代更迭期间都是一段小国分立的不稳定时代。其中最有名的便是长达 60 年的三国时期，该时期处于汉晋两代的更迭之间。
source: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.

reference: 在这些动乱时期，各路诸侯为争夺王位而发生激烈战争。
source: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.

reference: 三国是中国古代历史上最血腥的时代之一。成千上万的人为了争夺西安豪华宫殿最高的权力而死去。
source: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.

reference: 还有许多社会和政治影响，例如度量单位的使用、从专制到共和制的转变、民族主义、相信国家不属于唯一的统治者而是属于人民。
source: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.

reference: 此外，在革命之后，官职面向全体男性开放申请，这使得最有抱负、最成功之人有机会飞黄腾达。
source: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.

reference: 军队亦然，因为军衔的高低不再基于等级，而是基于才干。
source: Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber.

reference: 法国大革命也鼓舞了许多其他国家被压迫的工人阶级，开始他们自己的革命。
source: The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.

reference: 穆罕默德对尘世生活之外的事十分感兴趣。他以前经常到“努尔”（光明）山上一个叫做”希拉“的山洞里去冥想。
source: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation.

reference: 该洞穴本身，不仅经受住时间考验而保留下来，还为穆罕默德的灵性意向带来极其生动的形象。
source: he cave itself, which survived the times, gives a very vivid image of Muhammad’s spiritual inclinations.

reference: 该洞穴坐落在麦加 (Mecca) 北部的一座山顶上，与外界完全隔绝。
source: Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world.

reference: 事实上，即使知道它的存在，也不容易找到。一旦进入洞穴，就完全与世隔绝了。
source: In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation.

reference: 除了清澈美丽的天空和周围的群山，什么也看不见。在洞穴中，几乎看不到也听不到外界的景象和声音。
source: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.

topic: seven wonders of the world/pyramid at giza
reference: 吉萨大金字塔是七大奇迹中唯一至今仍屹立不倒的建筑。
source: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.

topic: seven wonders of the world/pyramid at giza
reference: 大金字塔是埃及人在公元前三世纪的杰作，它是众多向已故法老表示敬意的大型金字塔的其中之一。
source: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.

topic: seven wonders of the world/pyramid at giza
reference: 埃及死亡之谷的吉萨（Giza）高原（即“吉萨金字塔群”）包括多个金字塔（其中大金字塔是最大的）、几个小坟墓，几个寺庙和大狮身人面像。
source: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx.

topic: seven wonders of the world/pyramid at giza
reference: 大金字塔是为纪念胡夫法老而建造的，并为纪念胡夫的妻子和家庭成员建造了多座较小的金字塔、坟墓和庙宇。
source: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.

reference: “上弓”符号像字母 V，“下弓”符号像是钉书钉或是缺少了底边的正方形。
source: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.

reference: 向上指的是从顶端开始推弓，向下指的是从弓根处（也就是手握弓的地方）开始拉弓。
source: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.

reference: 上弓通常会发出更加柔和的声音，而下弓则会发出更强烈、更为坚定的声响。
source: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.

reference: 请随意用铅笔作上你自己的标记，但要记住，印出来的音符是具有音乐意义的，所以它们通常应该被尊重。
source: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.

reference: 在 1789 年 10 月 6 日，受到惊吓的国王路易十六、王后玛丽·安托瓦内特和他们的两个孩子（11 岁的玛丽·特蕾莎和 4 岁的路易斯·查尔斯），以及国王的妹妹伊丽莎白夫人，被一群集市妇女从凡尔赛赶回了巴黎。
source: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.

reference: 他们乘坐马车回到了巴黎，一群人包围了他们，大喊大叫地威胁国王和王后。
source: In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen.

reference: 暴民强迫国王和王后把马车的窗户完全打开。
source: The mob of people forced the King And Queen to have their carriage windows wide open.

reference: 当着吓坏了的女王的面，有一名暴徒一度挥动一颗皇家卫士的头颅，这名卫士是在凡尔赛宫被杀害的。
source: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.

reference: 美帝国主义在征服菲律宾时的战争开支是由菲律宾人民自己支付的。
source: The war expenditures of U.S. imperialism in the conquest of the Philippines were paid for by the Filipino people themselves.

reference: 他们被迫向美国殖民政权纳税，用于支付大部分开支，以及通过华尔街银行以菲律宾政府名义发行的债券的利息。
source: They were compelled to pay taxes to the U.S. colonial regime to defray a major part of the expenditures and the interest on bonds floated in the name of the Philippine government through the Wall Street banking houses.

reference: 当然，长期剥削菲律宾人民所获得的高额利润成为美帝国主义的基本收益。
source: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism.

reference: 要了解圣殿骑士，就必须了解促使圣殿骑士团成立的背景。
source: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order.

reference: 事件发生的时代通常被称为欧洲史的中世纪盛时，即的 11、12 和 13世纪时期（公元 1000-1300 年）。
source: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).

reference: 中世纪盛期之前是中世纪早期，之后是中世纪晚期，约定俗成认为中世纪晚期大约在 1500 年前后结束。
source: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.

reference: 技术决定论是一个在实践中涵盖许多种思想的术语，包括技术推动论，技术必要论，以及一个严格的定义——人类命运是由与科学定律相关的背后逻辑及其在技术中的表现驱动的。
source: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

reference: 大多数对技术决定论的解释都包括这两个总体思路：一是技术本身的发展在很大程度上超越了文化或政治影响，二是技术反过来会对社会产生不受社会条件制约的内在“影响”。
source: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.

reference: 例如，有人可能会说，汽车必然会促进道路的发展。
source: For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads.

reference: 然而，仅为少数汽车架设全国公路网，这在经济上并不可行，因此新的生产方式应运而生，以求降低汽车的拥有成本。
source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.

reference: 大众汽车保有量较高还会导致更高的道路交通事故发生率，而这将推动发明用于修复伤者伤处的全新医疗技术。
source: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.

reference: 浪漫主义具有很强的文化决定论色彩。这源于歌德、费希特和施莱格尔等作家。
source: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.

reference: 在浪漫主义的背景下，地理塑造了个体，随着时间的推移，与地理相关的习俗和文化出现了，这些习俗文化因为与社会所处的地方和谐相融，要比任意强加的法律好得多。
source: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.

reference: 正如巴黎被称为当代世界的时尚之都一样，君士坦丁堡被认为是欧洲封建时代的时尚之都。
source: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.

reference: 它作为奢侈品中心的声誉始于公元 400 年左右，一直延续到公元 1100 年左右。
source: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.

reference: 它的地位在十二世纪下降，主要是因为十字军返回时带的礼物，如丝绸和香料等，比拜占庭市场提供的更有价值。
source: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.

reference: 正是在这个时候，时尚之都的称号从君士坦丁堡转移到了巴黎。
source: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.

reference: 哥特式风格在 10 - 11 世纪到 14 世纪达到顶峰。
source: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.

reference: 起初，裙装深受东方拜占庭文化的影响。
source: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.

reference: 然而，由于文化交流迟缓，西方的时尚可能落后 25 到 30 年。
source: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.

reference: 随着中世纪走向末期，西欧人民逐渐发展出自己的风格。当时最大的进步之一就是十字军东征后，人们开始用纽扣来系衣服。
source: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.

reference: 自给农业，是为了生产仅能满足农业者及其家人所需的食物而进行的农业活动。
source: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.

reference: 自给农业是一种简单且通常是有机的系统，利用该生态区内保存的本地种子，与农作物轮作或其他相对简单的技术相结合，从而最大限度地提高产量。
source: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.

reference: 从历史上看，大部分农民从事的都是自给自足的农业生产。如今在很多发展中国家，情况依然如此。
source: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.

reference: 亚文化让志同道合的个人团结起来，这些人感到自己被社会标准所忽视，亚文化在他们之间培养出一种认同感。
source: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.

reference: 鉴于成员的年龄、种族、阶级、位置以及/或性别差异，亚文化可能会各具特色。
source: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.

reference: 让亚文化变得与众不同的特质，可能是语言、美学、宗教、政治、性别、地理或多种因素的组合。
source: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.

reference: 亚文化群体的成员，常常会象征性地利用独特的行事风格来表明他们的成员身份，包括时尚服装、举止和黑话。
source: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.

reference: 要说明社会化的重要性，最常用的方法之一是利用少数不幸儿童的案例。这些儿童由于被忽视、遭遇不幸或遭到故意虐待，在成长过程中没有在成年人的帮助下实现社会化。
source: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.

reference: 这样的孩子被称为“野孩”，意思是野孩子。 有些野孩子被人们（通常是他们自己的父母）所幽禁； 在某些情况下，孩子被遗弃是由于父母拒绝接受孩子有智力或身体上的严重缺陷。
source: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.

reference: 野孩子在被抛弃或离家出走之前，可能经历过严重的儿童虐待或创伤。
source: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.

reference: 据说，其他人是被动物养大的；有些人独自生活在野外。
source: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.

reference: 狼孩如果完全由非人类的动物抚养长大，其行为（在身体条件允许的范围内）会与该动物非常雷同，比如会对人类表现出恐惧或冷漠。
source: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.

reference: 虽然项目学习法应该使学习变得更容易、更有趣，但支架式学习法却更进一步。
source: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.

reference: 支架式教学不是一种学习方法，而是一种辅助刚学习使用新电脑程序或启动新项目的人的手段。
source: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.

reference: 支架式教学可以线上或线下进行，换句话说，老师是支架式教学的一种形式，就像 Microsoft Office 里的回形针小助手一样。
source: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.

reference: 虚拟支持内化在软件中，用来质疑、提示和解释那些可能对学生来说难以独自处理的程序。
source: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.

reference: 孩子们因为各种原因被寄养，原因有被忽视、被虐待，甚至是被勒索。
source: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.

reference: 任何孩子都不应该在一个没有教养、没有关爱、没有教育的环境中成长，但事与愿违。
source: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.

reference: 我们认为寄养系统对这些孩子来说是一个安全地带。
source: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.

reference: 我们的寄养系统应该提供安全的家、有爱心的看护者、稳定的教育和可靠的医疗。
source: Our foster care system is supposed to provide safe homes, loving caregivers, stable education, and reliable health care.

reference: 寄养体系应该提供一切其原生家庭所缺乏的必需品。
source: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.

reference: 互联网结合了大众传播和人际传播的要素。
source: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication.

reference: 互联网的鲜明特点使其在用途和满足方式方面增添了额外的维度。
source: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.

reference: 例如，“学习”和“交际”被认为是使用互联网的重要动机（詹姆斯等，1995）。
source: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).

reference: 在研究受众对网站的反应时，艾麦和麦克德（1998 年）把“个人参与”和“持续的关系”也作为新的动机因素。
source: “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.

reference: 录像的使用为阐释微表情（持续几毫秒的面部运动）带来了重大发现。
source: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.

reference: 具体说来，据说可以通过正确解读微表情来判断一个人是否在撒谎。
source: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.

reference: 奥利弗·萨克斯 (Oliver Sacks) 在他的论文《总统的演讲》中指出，那些因为脑损伤而无法理解语言的人仍然能够准确地判断说话人是否有诚意。
source: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.

reference: 他甚至提出，这种理解人类行为的能力可能是家犬等动物共有的本领。
source: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.

reference: 二十世纪的研究表明，基因变异有两种库：显性和隐性。
source: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.

reference: 突变会添加新的基因变异，而选择则会从表达的基因变异池中把变异移除。
source: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.

reference: 由于分离和重组，变异在每一代的两个库之间来回变动。
source: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.

reference: 在热带草原上，灵长类动物拥有类似人类的消化系统，现有的植物资源很难满足灵长类动物对氨基酸的需求。
source: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.

reference: 此外，如果做不到这一点将会带来严重的后果：生长抑制、营养不良，最终导致死亡。
source: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.

reference: 最容易获得的植物性资源应该是叶子和豆科植物中的蛋白质，但像我们这样的灵长类动物很难消化这种蛋白质，除非是煮熟的。
source: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.

reference: 相比之下，动物性食物（蚂蚁、白蚁、蛋）不仅容易消化，而且能提供大量蛋白质，里面含有全部必需的氨基酸。
source: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.

reference: 综上所述，如果我们的祖先解决“蛋白质问题”的途径与如今热带草原上的黑猩猩所使用的方法无异，我们也不应该感到惊讶。
source: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.

reference: 睡眠中断是指这样的过程：在正常睡眠期间有意地醒来，并且在短时间之后（10-60分钟）睡着。
source: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).

reference: 这很容易做到，使用相对安静的闹钟，让你在不被完全吵醒的情况下苏醒。
source: This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you.

reference: 如果你发现自己会在睡觉时重置闹钟，可以将闹钟放到房间的另一边，逼迫自己下床去关闹钟。
source: If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off.

reference: 其他基于生物节律的选择包括睡前大量饮用液体（尤其是水或茶——众所周知有利尿作用），强迫自己起来小便。
source: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.

reference: 一个人内心平静的程度与身体和精神的紧张程度是相反的。
source: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.

reference: 压力越小，生命力就表现得越积极。每个人都有可能找到绝对的平静和满足。
source: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.

reference: 每个人都能达到开悟的境界，而实现它的唯一阻碍是我们自己的紧张感和消极情绪。
source: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.

reference: 藏传佛教以佛陀的教义为基础，但通过大乘佛教的普世之爱和印度瑜伽的许多技巧得到了拓展。
source: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga.

reference: 原则上，藏传佛教是非常简单的。它包括昆达里尼瑜伽、冥想和普世之爱的方法。
source: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.

reference: 在昆达里尼瑜伽中，昆达里尼能量（启迪能量）通过瑜伽姿势、呼吸练习、念语和视觉形象被唤醒。
source: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.

reference: 西藏冥想的核心活动是天瑜伽。通过把不同的神形象化，净化能量通道，激活轮穴，从而达到顿悟的境界。
source: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

reference: 德国是二战中各国的共同敌人，这促进了苏联和美国之间的合作。随着战争的结束，制度、程序和文化上的冲突又使得两国分道扬镳。
source: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.

reference: 战争结束两年后，曾经的盟友如今成了敌人，冷战随即开始。
source: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.

reference: 这场战争持续了 40 年，代理军队在从非洲到亚洲的很多战场上真刀真枪地战斗，包括在阿富汗和古巴。
source: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.

reference: 到了 1939 年 9 月 17 日，波兰的防线已经被攻破，剩下的唯一希望就是沿着罗马尼亚桥头堡撤退和改编军队。
source: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.

reference: 然而，这些计划几乎在一夜之间被弃如敝履，在违反《里加和平条约》、《苏联波兰互不侵犯条约》及其他双边及多边国际条约，入侵波兰的东部地区之后，超过 80 万名苏联红军入境，并在白俄罗斯和乌克兰筑起阵地。
source: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

reference: 迄今为止，船运是跨洋运输大量人员和货物的最有效方式。
source: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.

reference: 从传统意义上讲，海军的任务是确保国家保持运输人员和货物的能力，同时，干扰敌人运输其人员和货物的能力。
source: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.

reference: 一个最值得注意的现代的例子就是二战期间的北大西洋战役。美国人尝试横跨大西洋运送人员和物资来帮助英国。
source: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

reference: 与此同时，以 U 型潜艇为主力的德国海军试图拦截这场运输。
source: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.

reference: 假如同盟国当时失败了，德国原本很可能像征服欧洲其他国家一样征服英国。
source: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.

reference: 山羊似乎是 1 万年前左右在伊朗的扎格罗斯山脉首次被驯养的。
source: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran.

reference: 古代文明和部落开始驯养它们，食用和使用它们的奶、肉、毛和皮。
source: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.

reference: 家山羊通常被成群放牧在山上或其他牧区，它们通常由牧山羊人（大多为儿童或青少年）照管，牧山羊人与更广为人知的牧羊人类似。这些放牧方法至今仍在使用。
source: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.

reference: 英国早在 16 世纪就修建了货车道。
source: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.

reference: 虽然马拉轨道车只是由平行的木板拼成，但在当时，就略显坎坷的道路而言，这些车能让拉车的马跑得更快，拉得更多。
source: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.

reference: 很早的时候就引进了轨枕，用于固定铁轨。但是，人们逐渐意识到，如果在铁轨上放上铁片，铁轨会更稳固有效。
source: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.

reference: 这成了普遍做法，但铁片会使木制的马车轮子磨损更严重。
source: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.

reference: 最终，木轮被铁轮所取代。1767 年，第一条全铁轨道问世。
source: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.

reference: 已知的第一种交通方式是步行。200 万年前，随着直立人（Homo Erectus，意思是直立的人）的出现，人类开始直立行走。
source: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).

reference: 他们的祖先南方古猿没有直立行走的习惯。
source: Their predecessors, the Australopithecus did not walk upright as habitually.

reference: 人们在 420 万至 390 万年前的南方古猿化石中发现了双足特化的现象，尽管乍得沙赫人（Sahelanthropus）可能早在 700 万年前就已经用双腿行走了。
source: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.

reference: 我们可以开始更环保地生活，加入环保运动，甚至可以成为环保积极分子，在一定程度上减少将来的灾难。
source: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree.

reference: 很多情况下这和症状疗法很相似。但是，如果我们不仅仅想要一个临时的解决方案的话，那么我们就应该找到问题的根源，并把它彻底根除。
source: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them.

reference: 显而易见，由于人类的科学和技术进步，世界发生了很大的变化，而人口过剩和人类奢侈的生活方式使问题变得更为严重。
source: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.

reference: 由议长约翰·汉考克和秘书长查尔斯·汤姆逊签署的手写草案在7月4日得到大陆议会批准，之后被送到几个街区以外的约翰·邓拉普印刷厂付印。
source: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.

reference: 一夜之间印刷了 150 到 200 份，就是现在众所周知的“邓拉普宽边”(Dunlap broadsides) 版。
source: Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as "Dunlap broadsides".

reference: 7 月 8 日，约翰·尼克松 (John Nixon) 在独立大厅的院子里首次公开宣读了这份文件。
source: The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8.
