reference: 其中一封于 7 月 6 日寄给了乔治·华盛顿，华盛顿于 7 月 9 日在纽约向他的军队宣读了这封信。一份副本于 8 月 10 日抵达伦敦。
source: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.

reference: 尚存的 25 份当列普单面印刷版（ Dunlap broadsides）是该文件现存最早的版本。手写原稿未能保留下来。
source: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.

reference: 许多古生物学家相信有一群恐龙存活了下来，并一直存活至今，也就是我们所称的“鸟类”。
source: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.

reference: 很多人认为它们并非恐龙，因为它们有羽毛，会飞。
source: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly.

reference: 但鸟类还是有很多地方跟恐龙相似。
source: But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur.

reference: 它们脚上有鳞片和爪子，会产卵，还像霸王龙一样用两条后腿走路。
source: They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.

reference: 当今，几乎所有投入使用的计算机都是以处理二进制编码的信息为基础的。
source: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.

reference: 二进制数只能占两个值里的其中一个，即0或者1，而这样的数被称为二进制数字，即计算机术语中的“位”。
source: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.

reference: 体内中毒可能不会立即显现出来，呕吐等症状十分普遍，因此不能立即作出诊断。
source: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made.

reference: 摄入毒物的最有力指示物可能是现场被打开的容器，里面装有药物或家用有毒化学品。
source: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.

reference: 查看毒药上的标签，获得具体急救指引。
source: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.

reference: 昆虫学家们用“虫子 (bug)”一词来正式称呼这一类的昆虫。
source: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.

reference: 这个术语源于人们对臭虫的熟悉，臭虫是一种非常适应寄生于人类的昆虫。
source: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans.

reference: 猎蝽和臭虫都是留巢昆虫，适应在宿主的巢穴或住房中生活。
source: Both Assassin-bugs and Bed-bugs are nidicolous, adapted to living in nest or housing of their host.

reference: 在美国的各个地区，约有 40 万例多发性硬化症 (MS) 病例，这一疾病已经成为中青年的主要神经系统疾病。
source: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults.

reference: 多发性硬化是一种影响中枢神经系统（由脑、脊髓和视神经组成）的疾病。
source: MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve.

reference: 研究发现，女性患多发性硬化症 (MS) 的几率是男性的两倍。
source: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.

reference: 一对夫妻可能出于自己的利益，或者为其子女利益着想，因而决定不进行生育。
source: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.

reference: 这些夫妇可能会为他们的孩子制定收养计划。
source: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.

reference: 在收养过程中，亲生父母终止了自己作为父母的权利，这样另一对夫妇才能抚养孩子。
source: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.

reference: 科学的主要目的是通过科学方法找出世界的运行方式。实际上，这种方法可为大多数科学研究提供指导。
source: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.

reference: 实验是一种用来消除一个或多个可能性假设的试验，不过，实验并不是唯一的方法。提出问题及进行观察也可以指导科学研究。
source: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.

reference: 自然主义者和哲学家关注古典文本，特别是拉丁文版的《圣经》。
source: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.

reference: 亚里士多德就所有科学领域的问题（包括心理学在内）所发表的观点都被一一接纳。
source: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.

reference: 随着希腊知识的衰落，西方脱离了其希腊哲学和科学根源。
source: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.

reference: 研究者观察到的许多生理节律和行为节律很大程度上往往取决于通过生物钟而产生的内生周期及其存在。
source: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.

reference: 周期性的节奏不仅仅是对外部周期信号的简单反应。这种节奏在包括细菌、真菌、植物和动物等大多数生物中都有记录。
source: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.

reference: 生物钟是能够自我维持的摆动装置，即使在没有外界提示的情况下，也会持续一段时间自由运转的周期。
source: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.

reference: 赫希及崔斯（Hershey and Chase）的实验，是说明 DNA 是遗传物质的主要迹象依据之一。
source: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material.

reference: 赫尔希和蔡斯利用噬菌体或病毒，将他们自己的 DNA 植入到细菌之中。
source: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.

reference: 他们做了两个实验，一个是用放射性磷标记噬菌体的 DNA，一个是用放射性硫标记噬菌体的蛋白质。
source: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.

reference: 突变会产生各种各样不同的影响，这取决于突变的类型、受影响遗传物质的重要性以及受影响的细胞是否为生殖系细胞。
source: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.

reference: 只有生殖细胞的突变才会遗传给孩子，而其他细胞的突变则会导致细胞死亡或癌症。
source: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.

reference: 自然风光旅游业吸引了那些对自然地区感兴趣的游客，他们前来观赏包括野生动植物在内的自然风景。
source: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.

reference: 现场活动包括打猎、钓鱼、摄影、观鸟、参观公园和研究生态系统。
source: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.

reference: 例如，在婆罗洲参观、拍摄和了解红毛猩猩。
source: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.

reference: 每天早上，人们驾车离开小乡镇上班，路上和他们擦肩而过的人的工作地点正是他们离开的地方。
source: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left.

reference: 在这种动态交通穿梭中，每个人都以某种方式与基于私家车的交通系统相连接，并对其提供支持。
source: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.

reference: 如今，科学表明，这种大规模的碳经济，再也无法让过去 200 万年来支持人类进化发展的生物圈保持稳定状态。
source: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.

reference: 每个人都是社会的一份子，都会使用交通系统。而几乎每个人都对交通系统有怨言。
source: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems.

reference: 在发达国家，你甚少会听到关于水质或桥梁倒塌类似程度的投诉。
source: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.

reference: 为什么交通系统会引起这样的投诉？为什么它们每天都会出故障？是交通工程师不称职吗？或者是有更根本的原因？
source: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?

reference: 交通流量研究的是驾驶员和车辆在两点之间的运动，以及它们之间的相互作用。
source: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another.

reference: 遗憾的是，研究车流很困难，因为不能对驾驶员的行为进行百分之百确定的预测。
source: Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty.

reference: 幸运的是，司机的行为往往在一个合理的一致性范围内；因此，交通流量往往具有一定的合理一致性，可以粗略地用数学方式表示。
source: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.

reference: 为了更好地表示交通流量，在以下三个主要特征之间建立了关系：(1) 流量、(2) 密度和 (3) 速度。
source: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.

reference: 这些关系对道路设施的规划、设计和运营有帮助。
source: These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.

reference: 昆虫是最早在空中飞行的动物。飞行能力让它们更容易躲避敌人，更有效地寻找食物和配偶。
source: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.

reference: 大多数昆虫都具有一种优势，可以将翅膀沿身体向后折叠。
source: Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body.

reference: 这让它们有了更多小面积空间来躲避捕食者。
source: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.

reference: 如今，唯一不能向后折叠翅膀的昆虫是蜻蜓和蜉蝣。
source: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.

reference: 几千年前，一个叫阿里斯塔克斯的人曾说，太阳系围绕着太阳旋转。
source: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun.

reference: 有些人认为他是对的，但也有很多人持相反意见；他们认为太阳系是围绕着地球运转的，太阳也是（甚至其他恒星也是）。
source: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).

reference: 这似乎是合理的，因为地球感觉不到自己在移动，不是吗？
source: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?

reference: 亚马逊河是世界上第二长，也是最大的河流。 它的水量是第二大河流的 8 倍以上。
source: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.

reference: 亚马逊河也是地球上最宽的河流，有些河段的宽度可达6英里。
source: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.

reference: 亚马逊河占全世界所有河流的入海流量的 20%。
source: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon.

reference: 亚马孙河干流长 6387 公里（3980 英里）。河水来自数千条较小的支流。
source: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

reference: 尽管石制金字塔的建造一直持续到古王国末期，但吉萨金字塔的宏大的规模和高超的建造技术从未被超越。
source: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction.

reference: 新王国时期的古埃及人惊叹于其前辈的已有一千多年历史的纪念碑。
source: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

reference: 梵蒂冈城的人口大约有 800 人。它是世界上最小的独立国家，也是人口最少的国家。
source: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population.

reference: 梵蒂冈城在法律法规和官方通信中使用意大利语。
source: Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications.

reference: 意大利语也是大部分在该国工作的人日常使用的语言，拉丁语则常使用于宗教仪式。
source: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.

reference: 梵蒂冈城的所有公民均为罗马天主教徒。
source: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.

reference: 人们自古以来就知道金、银、铜等基本化学元素，因为这些元素都能以自然形态在自然界中发现，而且比较容易使用原始工具进行开采。
source: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.

reference: 哲学家亚里士多德提出一种理论，即任何事物都是由土、水、空气和火四种元素中的一种或多种组成的。
source: Aristotle, a philosopher, theorised that everything is made up of a mixture of one or more of four elements. They were earth, water, air, and fire.

reference: 这更像是物质的四种状态（顺序不分手）：固体、液体、气体和等离子体，不过他也提出了理论，认为它们会转变成新的物质，构成我们所看到的事物。
source: This was more like the four states of matter (in the same order): solid, liquid, gas, and plasma, though he also theorised that they change into new substances to form what we see.

reference: 合金基本上由两种或以上金属混合而成。不要忘记一点，元素周期表上有很多元素。
source: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.

reference: 钙、钾等元素属于金属，银和金等元素当然也是金属。
source: Elements like calcium and potassium are considered metals. Of course, there are also metals like silver and gold.

reference: 也有含少量非金属元素（例如碳）的合金。
source: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.

reference: 宇宙中的一切都由物质构成，而所有的物质都由被称为原子的微小粒子组成。
source: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms.

reference: 原子如此微小，以至于这句话末尾的句号处可以容纳数万亿的原子。
source: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.

reference: 因此，铅笔一问世，就成了许多人的心头好。
source: Thus, the pencil was a good friend to many people when it came out.

reference: 遗憾的是，随着新的书写方式的出现，铅笔的地位越来越低，使用也越来越少。
source: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.

reference: 人们现在在电脑屏幕上写信息，永远不必接触卷笔刀了。
source: People now write messages on computer screens, never having to come close to a sharpener.

reference: 人们只能猜测，当更新的产品出现时，键盘的结局会是怎样。
source: One can only wonder what the keyboard will become when something newer comes along.

reference: 裂变原子弹的工作原理如下：把一个原子核和许多质子及中子聚在一起需要能量。
source: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons.

reference: 有点像推着一辆笨重的小推车上山。再次分裂原子核，然后释放一些能量。
source: Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy.

reference: 有些原子含有不稳定的原子核，这意味着它们很可能会在很少或没有刺激的情况下发生分裂。
source: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

reference: 月球的表面由岩石和灰尘组成。月球的外层叫做地壳。
source: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust.

reference: 地壳近侧厚约 70 公里，远侧厚约 100 公里。
source: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.

reference: 阴暗面下面的地壳薄一些，高地下的地壳厚一些。
source: It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands.

reference: 因为地壳更薄，所以近的一面可能会有更多的阴暗部，熔岩更容易上升到地表。
source: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

reference: 激励内容理论的核心是寻找令人认同或产生兴趣的因素。
source: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.

reference: 这些理论表明，当人们成熟到一定程度进入成年时，某些需求和/或欲望就被内化了。
source: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood.

reference: 这些理论研究为什么某些人想要做他们所做的事情，以及他们所处的环境中哪些事情会让他们做或不做某些事情。
source: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.

reference: 两种流行的内容理论，分别是马斯洛的需求层次理论和赫茨贝格的双因素理论。
source: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.

reference: 一般来说，当管理者开始领导过去的同事时，会出现两种行为。一种情况是，他们会努力与团队成员保持“亲密关系”。
source: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).

reference: 这一类型的经理很难做出不得人心的决定，在执行纪律措施、绩效评估、分配责任和追究责任方面也存在困难。
source: This type of manager has difficulty making unpopular decisions, performing disciplinary action, performance evaluations, assigning responsibility, and holding people accountable.

reference: 在另一种极端情况下，这个人会变成一个与之前迥然不同的个体，觉得他/她必须改变团队所做的一切，并把成果据为己有。
source: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.

reference: 毕竟，领导者对团队的成败负有最终责任。
source: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team.

reference: 这种行为经常导致领导和团队其他成员之间产生分歧。
source: This behavior oftentimes results in rifts between the leaders and the rest of the team.

reference: 虚拟团队需要坚持与传统团队同样的质量标准，但也有细微的差别。
source: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences.

reference: 虚拟团队成员经常担任所对应的线下团队的接洽点。
source: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.

reference: 他们往往比传统的团队成员拥有更多的自主权，因为他们的团队可能会针对不同的时区安排开会时间，而本地管理层可能不理解这一点。
source: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management.

reference: 真正“隐形团队”的存在 (Larson 和 LaFasto，1989，p109），也是虚拟团队的一个独特组成部分。
source: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.

reference: “看不见的团队”是指每个成员都要向其汇报的管理团队。它为所有成员制定标准。
source: The “invisible team” is the management team to which each of the members report. The invisible team sets the standards for each member.

reference: 为什么一个组织要花这么长时间来建立学习型组织呢？将组织学习的概念付诸实践的目标之一就是创新。
source: Why would an organization want to go through the time consuming process of establishing a learning organization? One goal for putting organizational learning concepts into practice is innovation.

reference: 当所有可用的资源在一个组织的职能部门之间得到有效利用时，创造力和独创性就会发生。
source: When all available resources are effectively used across the functional departments of an organization, creativity and ingenuity can transpire.

reference: 因此，一个组织在共同努力克服障碍的过程中，往往会带来新的创新流程，以满足客户的需求。
source: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need.

reference: 在组织能够创新前，领导必须创造出一种创新文化，分享知识，并进行有组织的学习。
source: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.

reference: 《天使》(2006) 将连续体方案解释为可以帮助组织达到更高绩效水平的一种方法。
source: Angel (2006), explains the Continuum approach as a method being used to help organizations reach a higher level of performance.

reference: 神经生物学数据为认知研究的理论方法提供了物理证据。因此，它缩小了研究范围，并使研究更加精确。
source: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.

reference: 大脑病理和行为之间的相关性可以为科学家们的研究提供支持。
source: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.

reference: 我们很早就知道，不同类型的脑损伤、创伤、病变和肿瘤会对人的行为产生影响，并导致某些心智功能发生变化。
source: It has been known for a long time that different types of brain damage, traumas, lesions, and tumours affect behaviour and cause changes in some mental functions.

reference: 新技术的兴起让我们能够看到和研究大脑的结构和工作过程，这些是以前从未见过的。
source: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.

reference: 这为我们建立仿真模型提供了大量的信息和材料，有助于我们理解大脑运作的过程。
source: This provides us with a lot of information and material to build simulation models which help us to understand processes in our mind.

reference: 人工智能有很强的科幻色彩，但它其实是计算机科学非常重要的一个分支，研究的是机器的行为、学习和智能适应。
source: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine.

reference: 人工智能 (AI) 的研究涉及制造机器让需要智能行为的任务自动化。
source: Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior.

reference: 例子包括控制、规划和调度，回应客户诊断及客户问题的能力，还有手写识别，声音和脸部功能。
source: Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face.

reference: 所有的这些都成为了独立的学科，着重为现实生活中的问题提供解决方案。
source: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.

reference: 人工智能系统现在经常用于经济、医学、工程学和军事领域，有些家用计算机和电子游戏软件应用程序已经有内置的人工智能系统。
source: The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.

reference: 实地考察是任何教学活动的重要组成部分。通常，老师会很乐意带学生去那些公交车无法到达的地方。
source: Field trips are a large part of any classroom. Quite often a teacher would love to take her students places to which a bus trip is not an option.

reference: 虚拟实地考察是高科技的解决方案。学生可以在课堂上观看博物馆的人工制品，参观水族馆，或者欣赏精美的艺术品。
source: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.

reference: 以虚拟方式分享实地考察，也是回顾行程以及与以后班级分享经验的好办法。
source: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.

reference: 例如，北卡罗莱纳州本尼特学校 ( Bennet School) 的学生每年都会设计一个有关他们的州府之行的网站。网站每年都会重新设计，但是老版本会在线保存，用作剪贴簿。
source: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.

reference: 博客还能帮助学生提高写作能力。尽管学生们开始写博客时，用的语法和拼写往往都很马虎，读者的出现通常会改变这一状况。
source: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.

reference: 学生往往是最挑剔的读者，所以博客作者开始努力提高写作水平，避免受到批判。
source: Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism.

reference: 此外，写博客也“迫使学生对周遭世界更具洞察力“。为满足观众兴趣，学生们受此鼓舞，变得聪明和有趣起来。
source: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).

reference: 写博客是一种能够激发合作的工具，还能鼓励学生把学习延伸到传统的学校授课之外。
source: Blogging is a tool that inspires collaboration, and encourages students to extend learning well beyond the traditional school day.

reference: "适当使用博客，"可以使学生变得更善于分析和进行思辨；通过积极回应网络材料，学生们可以在他人文章的上下文语境中找到自己的立场，并能够针对特定问题提出自己的观点（Oravec, 2002）。"
source: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).

reference: 渥太华是加拿大的首都，富有魅力且采用使用双语制，亮点是一系列展示着加拿大过去和现在的艺术画廊和博物馆。
source: Ottawa is Canada's charming, bilingual capital and features an array of art galleries and museums that showcase Canada's past and present.

reference: 再往南是尼亚加拉大瀑布，往北则是马斯科卡河 (Muskoka) 及河对面未开发的自然美景。
source: Farther south is Niagara Falls and the north is home to the untapped natural beauty of the Muskoka and beyond.

reference: 诸此种种都让安大略省成为了外来人士所想的加拿大典型模样。
source: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders.

reference: 再往北的广袤地区人烟稀少，有些地方是杳无人烟的荒野。
source: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.

reference: 一组令人吃惊的人口数据对比：居住在美国的非裔美国人人数比加拿大公民人数还要多。
source: For a comparison of population that surprises many: There are more African Americans living in the US than there are Canadian citizens.

reference: 东非岛屿位于非洲东海岸外的印度洋上。
source: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa.

reference: 马达加斯加是目前为止最大的岛屿，对野生动物来说还是一片独立的大陆。
source: Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife.

reference: 较小的岛屿大多是独立国家，或所属于法国，它们以豪华海滩度假胜地而闻名。
source: Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts.

reference: 阿拉伯人也把伊斯兰教带到了这片土地，这一教义在科摩罗和马约特国家盛行。
source: The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte.

reference: 欧洲的影响和殖民主义始于15世纪，当时葡萄牙探险家瓦斯科·达·伽马（Vasco da Gama）发现了从欧洲到印度的开普敦航线。
source: European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

reference: 北部与萨赫勒地区接壤；南部和西部临大西洋。
source: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean.

reference: 女性：建议无论实际婚姻状况如何，所有女性游客都应说自己已婚。
source: Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status.

reference: 戴戒指也会有帮助（但不要戴看上去太贵的戒指。
source: It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive.

reference: 女性应该意识到文化差异可能会导致她们所认为的骚扰行为；而且被人尾随、抓胳膊等情况并不少见。
source: Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc.

reference: 拒绝男人时要坚定，别害怕坚持自己的立场（不管文化有无差异，都要果断回绝！）。
source: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

reference: 现代城市卡萨布兰卡是由柏柏尔 (Berber) 渔民在公元前 10 世纪建立的，曾被腓尼基人、罗马人和马里尼德人 (Merenid) 用作战略港口，港口曾被称为安法 (Anfa)。
source: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.

reference: 葡萄牙人毁灭了这座城并进行了重建，还将其命名为卡萨布兰卡 (Casa Branca) ，直到 1755 年地震后才遗弃了它。
source: The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755.

reference: 摩洛哥苏丹将该市重建为 Daru l-Badya。西班牙商人在这里建立了贸易基地，并将其命名为卡萨布兰卡。
source: The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there.

reference: 卡萨布兰卡是全摩洛哥最无趣的购物地之一。
source: Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco.

reference: 在麦地那老城附近，出售塔吉锅、陶器、皮具、水烟等摩洛哥传统商品和各种小玩意儿的店铺随处可见，但这些商店都是针对游客的。
source: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

reference: 戈马是刚果民主共和国的一个旅游城市，位于刚果的最东边，靠近卢旺达。
source: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda.

reference: 2002 年，戈马被尼拉贡戈火山的熔岩所摧毁。火山熔岩掩埋了该镇的大部分街道，尤其是镇中心。
source: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.

reference: 尽管戈马还算安全，但前往戈马以外的任何地方都应该事先调查，以便了解北基伍省持续的战斗有没有缓和。
source: While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province.

reference: 这座城市也是攀登尼拉贡戈火山（Nyiragongo）以及非洲最便宜的山地大猩猩追踪项目的基地。
source: The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa.

reference: 你可以乘坐 boda-boda（出租的摩托车）游览戈马（Goma）。短途车程的正常（当地）价格是 500 刚果法郎。
source: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

reference: 又因为相对偏僻，“廷巴克图”被用来比喻遥远的异国他乡。
source: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands.

reference: 今天，虽然廷巴克图的名声使之成为旅游胜地，而且有一个机场，但这是一个贫穷的城镇。
source: Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport.

reference: 1990 年，由于沙漠的威胁，它被列入了濒危世界遗产名录。
source: In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands.

reference: 这是亨利·路易斯·盖茨 (Henry Louis Gates) 在美国公共广播公司的《非洲世界的奇迹》特别节目中的重要一站。
source: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.

reference: 这座城市与该国其他城市形成了鲜明对比，因为它更多的是阿拉伯风格，而不是非洲风格。
source: The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African.

reference: 克鲁格国家公园 (KNP) 位于南非东北部，东部与莫桑比克接壤，北部与津巴布韦接壤，南部以鳄鱼河 (Crocodile River) 为边境。
source: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.

reference: 公园占地 19500 平方公里，分为 14 个不同的生态区，为不同的野生动植物提供支持。
source: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife.

reference: 它是南非的主要景点之一，被认为是南非国家公园体系 (SANParks) 的主打景点。
source: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).

reference: 与所有南非国家公园一样，该公园每天都收取养护费和门票费。
source: As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park.

reference: 买一张万能卡（Wild Card）也有不少好处。带着这张卡，你可以进入南非的一些公园或全部的国家公园。
source: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

reference: 香港岛是香港地区的代名词，也是众多游客心目中的焦点所在。
source: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus.

reference: 构成香港天际线的众多建筑就像是一幅闪闪发光的条形图，在维多利亚港水域的映衬下显得格外醒目。
source: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour.

reference: 若想从最佳角度欣赏香港的美景，可以离开该岛，前往对面的九龙海滨。
source: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.

reference: 香港岛大部分的城市发展都集中在北岸的填海土地上。
source: The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore.

reference: 这里是英国殖民者占领的地方，所以如果你想寻找这片领土殖民历史的证据，这里是一个很好的起点。
source: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

reference: 孙德本尔斯 (Sundarbans) 是世界上最大的滨海红树林带，林带长 80 公里（50 英里），从海岸一直延伸至孟加拉国和印度内陆。
source: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.

reference: 孙德尔本斯 (Sundarbans) 已经被联合国教科文组织宣布为世界遗产。印度境内的这部分森林被称为孙德尔本斯国家公园。
source: The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park.

reference: 不过，这些森林不仅仅是红树林沼泽，里面还有一些巨大丛林的遗迹，这些丛林曾经长满了恒河平原。
source: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain.

reference: 孙德本尔斯的面积为 3850 平方公里，其中约三分之一为水域/沼泽区。
source: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.

reference: 自 1966 年以来，孙德尔本斯一直是野生动物保护区。据估计，目前该区生活着 400 只皇家孟加拉虎和大约 3 万只梅花鹿。
source: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

reference: 全天都有公交车从城区间公交站（跨河）发车，但大部分车次，特别是开往东部和贾卡尔/布姆唐的公交车都在 06:30 至 07:30 之间发车。
source: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.

reference: 鉴于区间巴士经常客满，建议提前几天购票。
source: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.

reference: 大多数地区都能坐到舒适结实的日本 Coaster 小巴车。
source: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.

reference: 要前往附近地方，如帕罗 (Nu 150) 和普那卡 (Nu 200)，共享出租车是一种快捷舒适的方式。
source: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

reference: 奥亚波克河大桥是一座斜拉桥，横跨奥亚波克河，连接巴西奥亚波克和法属圭亚那的圣乔治。
source: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.

reference: 两座桥塔高 83 米，桥的长度为 378 米，有两条 3.50米宽的车道。
source: The two towers rise to a height of 83 meters, it's 378 meters long and it has two lanes of 3.50 m wide.

reference: 桥下垂直净空 15 米。该项目于 2011 年 8 月完工，但直到 2017 年 3 月才开始通车。
source: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.

reference: 大桥预计将于 2017 年 9 月全面投入使用，届时巴西海关检查站预计也将完工。
source: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.

reference: 瓜拉尼人 (Guaraní) 是居住在现东巴拉圭地区的最重要的土著群体，他们过着半游牧式的游猎生活，也会进行自给自足的农业活动。
source: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.

reference: 查科 (Chaco) 地区是瓜伊库鲁 (Guaycuru) 和帕亚瓜 (Payagua) 等其他土著部落的家园，他们靠狩猎、采集和捕鱼为生。
source: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.

reference: 16 世纪的巴拉圭曾被称为“印第安大省”，是西班牙征服者与当地土著群体的相遇后的产物。
source: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.

reference: 西班牙人开始了长达三个世纪的殖民时期。
source: The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries.

reference: 自从 1537 年亚松森（Asunción）建成以来，巴拉圭一直设法保留了这座城的许多本土特色和特性。
source: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.

reference: 阿根廷以拥有世界顶尖的马球队和球员而闻名。
source: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.

reference: 每年规模最大的锦标赛于 12 月份在拉斯卡尼塔斯 (Las Cañitas) 的马球场举行。
source: The largest tournament of the year takes place in December at the polo fields in Las Cañitas.

reference: 在一年中的其他日子，这里也能看到比较小型的锦标赛和比赛。
source: Smaller tournaments and matches can also be seen here at other times of the year.

reference: 如要了解锦标赛新闻和如何购买马球比赛门票，请查看阿根廷马球协会网站。
source: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.

reference: 福克兰群岛的官方货币是福克兰英镑，与英镑等值。
source: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).

reference: 可以在岛上唯一的银行兑换货币，该银行位于斯坦利，在 FIC West 商店对面。
source: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.

reference: 英镑一般在岛上所有地方都通用，斯坦利境内也往往可以用信用卡和美元付款。
source: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted.

reference: 在外围岛屿，可能无法使用信用卡，但可以使用英美货币；请事先与房主联系，确认可接受的付款方式。
source: On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method.

reference: 几乎不可能在岛外兑换福克兰群岛的货币，所以要在离岛之前兑换。
source: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

reference: 蒙得维的亚位于赤道以南，因此北半球冬天的时候，那里是夏天，反之亦然。
source: Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa.

reference: 蒙得维的亚位于亚热带地区；在夏季月份，气温常常超过 30°C 。
source: Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common.

reference: 冬天可能会比看上去显得更冷：温度很少低于零度，但当风和湿度结合在一起，会让人感觉比温度计显示的温度要冷。
source: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.

reference: 这里没有特定的“雨季”和“旱季”：全年的降雨量大致相同。
source: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.

reference: 虽然公园里许多动物都见惯了人类，但野生动物毕竟是野生动物，我们不应该去喂养或打扰它们。
source: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed.

reference: 公园的管理人员表示：与熊和狼至少要保持 100 码/米的距离，而与所有其他野生动物则需要保持 25 码/米的距离！
source: According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals!

reference: 无论看起来是多么的温顺，野牛、麋鹿、驼鹿、熊等几乎所有的大型动物都有可能攻击人类。
source: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.

reference: 每年，数十名游客都会因未能保持适当距离而受伤。这些动物体型庞大，充满野性，具有潜在的危险性，因此请给它们留出一些空间。
source: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.

reference: 此外，要注意气味会引来熊和其他野生动物，因此要避免携带或烹饪散发气味的食物，并保持营地清洁。
source: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.

reference: 阿皮亚是萨摩亚的首都。该城镇位于乌波卢（Upolu）岛上，人口数量不足 4 万。
source: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.

reference: 阿皮亚始建于 19 世纪 50 年代，自 1959 年以来一直是萨摩亚的首都。
source: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.

reference: 该海湾曾在 1889 年发生过一场臭名昭著的海军对峙，当时来自德国、美国和英国的七艘舰船拒绝驶离这个海湾。
source: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.

reference: 除了一艘英国巡航舰外，其余船只悉数沉没。近 200 名美国人和德国人丧失生命。
source: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.

reference: 在由茅茅运动为争取独立而组织发起的斗争中，该镇的一场和平集会致使大酋长图普阿·塔马塞塞·利罗菲三世（Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III）遇害身亡。
source: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.

reference: 奥克兰横跨两个港口，因此当地有很多海滩。其中最有人气的海滩分布在三个地区。
source: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.

reference: 北岸海滩（位于北港区内）在太平洋上，从北部的长湾 (Long Bay) 一直延伸到南部的德文波特 (Devonport)。
source: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.

reference: 这里几乎都是沙滩，游泳很安全，大部分地方都有新西兰圣诞树的树荫。
source: They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees.

reference: 塔马基大道 (Tamaki Drive) 海滩位于怀特玛塔港 (Waitemata Harbour)，就在奥克兰中部的米森湾 (Mission Bay) 和圣赫里尔斯 (St Heliers) 的高档郊区。
source: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.

reference: 这些海滩有时挤满了度假的家庭，沿岸排列着各种各样的商店。 游泳很安全。
source: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

reference: 当地主要的啤酒是“一号”啤酒。它的口感不复杂，但很好喝、很清爽。另一款本地啤酒叫做“曼塔 (Manta)”。
source: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".

reference: 在这里可以买到很多法国葡萄酒，但新西兰和澳大利亚的葡萄酒可能更经得起长途运输。
source: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.

reference: 当地的自来水完全可以达到安全饮用标准，但如果你还是担心，也可以很容易地买到瓶装水。
source: The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful.

reference: 对澳大利亚人来说，“馥芮白”咖啡的概念还比较陌生。小杯黑咖啡是“浓缩咖啡”，卡布奇诺的奶油（不是泡沫）堆得很高，而茶是不搭配牛奶的。
source: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.

reference: 热巧克力达到了比利时的标准。果汁价格昂贵，但品质很好。
source: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.

reference: 全年都有很多人到大堡礁旅游，而且在大堡礁很少发生由于参加上述任何活动而受伤的情况。
source: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.

reference: 尽管如此，还是要听从有关部门的建议，遵守所有的标志并密切注意安全警告。
source: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.

reference: 箱型水母会在每年十月到次年四月间出现在 1770 镇的海滩和河口附近。偶尔也能在其他时间点发现它们的身影。
source: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.

reference: 鲨鱼确实存在，但它们很少攻击人类。多数鲨鱼害怕人类，会游走。
source: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.

reference: 咸水鳄的主要栖息地并非海洋，而是罗克汉普顿 (Rockhampton) 北部的河口。
source: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.

reference: 提前预订可以让旅行者安心，知道到达目的地后就有地方过夜。
source: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.

reference: 虽然旅行社可能会帮你预订露营 等其他形式的住宿，但他们通常会与特定的酒店合作。
source: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.

reference: 旅行社通常会提供包括早餐、机场往返接送的套餐，有的甚至会提供航班和酒店住宿套餐。
source: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.

reference: 如果你需要时间考虑价格是否合适，或者去往目的地需要获取其他证件（如签证），他们可以为你保留预订。
source: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).

reference: 如果需要进行任何修改或有任何要求，应该首先通过旅行代理商进行办理，而不是直接与酒店接洽。
source: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

reference: 在一些音乐节，绝大多数参加者选择在现场露营，而且大部分参加者认为这是音乐节体验极为重要的一部分。
source: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.

reference: 如果想近距离观看演出，你得早点到，在靠近舞台的地方占好营地。
source: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.

reference: 记住，虽然主舞台上的音乐可能已经结束，但节日的其他部分可能会一直演奏音乐到深夜。
source: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.

reference: 有些音乐节会为带小孩的家庭设立特别的露营区。
source: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

reference: 如果在冬天穿越北波罗的海，要检查客舱的位置，因为在冰面上航行会给那些受影响最严重的人带来非常可怕的噪音。
source: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.

reference: 圣彼得堡游轮包括城内观光活动。游轮乘客可获豁免签证（详情请参阅服务条款）。
source: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

reference: 赌场一般会想方设法让客人花费尽量多的时间和金钱。赌场通常没有窗户和时钟，出口也很难找到。
source: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.

reference: 他们通常会提供特别的食品、饮料和娱乐活动，让客人保持愉悦，留在赌场。
source: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.

reference: 有些场地免费提供酒精饮料。然而，醉酒会削弱人的判断能力，所有优秀的赌徒都知道保持清醒的重要性。
source: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

reference: 任何在高纬度地区开车或翻越山口的人，都应该考虑到可能遭遇下雪、结冰或冻结温度的情况。
source: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.

reference: 在冰雪覆盖的路面上，摩擦力很小，你不能像在光洁的柏油路上一样开车。
source: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.

reference: 暴雪时，极短时间内降雪量就可以足以困住你。
source: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.

reference: 降雪、飘雪、车窗上的水珠或结冰可能也会挡住视线。
source: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.

reference: 另一方面，冰雪天气在很多国家都十分常见，全年交通也几乎不会中断。
source: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

reference: 游猎活动也许是非洲最吸引人的旅游活动，也是许多游客行程中的亮点。
source: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.

reference: “游猎 (safari)”一词，在常见的用法中是指通过陆路旅行去观赏令人惊叹的非洲野生动物，尤其是在热带草原上。
source: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.

reference: 一些动物（例如大象和长颈鹿）往往喜欢挨近汽车，而标准的设备可以让人更好地欣赏。
source: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.

reference: 狮子、猎豹和花豹有时很怕人，用双筒望远镜你能看得更清楚。
source: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.

reference: 徒步旅行（ 也叫”丛林漫步”、“远足旅行”或“远足”）主要是徒步行走，通常耗时几个小时或持续数日。
source: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.

reference: 残奥会将于 2021 年 8 月 24 日至 9 月 5 日举行。部分赛事将在日本其他地方举办。
source: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.

reference: 东京将成为唯一举办过两届夏季奥运会的亚洲城市，第一次是在1964 年。
source: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.

reference: 如果你在宣布推迟之前预订了 2020 年的航班和住宿，则可能会面临棘手的情况。
source: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.

reference: 取消政策各不相同，但截至三月末，大多数由于新冠病毒而出台的取消政策并没有延长到 2020 年 7 月——原定奥运会举办时间。
source: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.

reference: 预计大部分赛事的门票价格将在 2,500 日元到 13 万日元之间，一般票价约为 7,000 日元。
source: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

reference: 熨烫潮湿的衣服可以帮助其变干。即便房间并没有熨斗和熨衣板，但是许多酒店提供出借服务。
source: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.

reference: 如果没有熨斗，或者你不喜欢穿熨烫过的袜子，那你可以用吹风机试试（如果有的话）。
source: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.

reference: 小心不要让衣服变得太热（这可能会产生收缩现象，在极端情况下会把衣服烤焦）。
source: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).

reference: 净水的方法有很多，有些对特定的污染更有效。
source: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.

reference: 在某些地区，水煮一分钟就足够了，在其他地区则需要几分钟的时间。
source: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.

reference: 过滤器的效果各不相同，如果对此有所顾虑，那么您应该考虑购买信誉好的公司生产的密封瓶装水。
source: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

reference: 旅行者可能会遇到在家乡不常见的有害动物。
source: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.

reference: 害虫会破坏食物，引起刺激性反应，在更严重的情况下会引起过敏反应，传播毒液或传染病。
source: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.

reference: 传染性疾病本身，或那些能通过暴力杀伤人类的危险动物，通常不属于害虫之列。
source: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

reference: 免税购物是指在特定地点购买免税商品的机会。
source: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.

reference: 前往课征重税的国家/地区的旅客有时可以省下一大笔钱，在这些地方购买酒水和烟草等产品特别划算。
source: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.

reference: 在布法罗-匹兹堡高速公路上，行车条件最具挑战性的是波特马里恩 (Point Marion) 到费尔蒙特 (Fairmont) 之间的路段，这段路频繁地途径多处偏僻的边远地区。
source: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.

reference: 如果你不习惯在乡村道路上开车，那可要保持头脑清醒：这里到处都是陡坡、窄车道和急转弯。
source: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.

reference: 该处公示的限速比之前和之后的路段明显要低，常见的限速是 35-40 英里/小时（56-64 公里/小时），而严格遵守限速要求的重要性也甚于其他路段。
source: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.

reference: 不过，令人奇怪的是，这里的手机服务比沿途的许多其他路线（例如宾夕法尼亚州荒原）要强得多。
source: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

reference: 德国的糕点很不错，巴伐利亚的点心就更加丰富多彩，与他们南边的邻居奥地利很相似。
source: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.

reference: 水果点心很常见，苹果全年都能用来做点心，夏天还能吃到樱桃和李子。
source: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.

reference: 许多德国烘焙食品也以杏仁、榛子和其他坚果为特色。受欢迎的蛋糕与浓咖啡往往是绝配。
source: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.

reference: 如果你想来点风味浓郁的小点心，可以试试果酱包，这种甜点在不同地区有不同的称呼，如 Berliner、Pfannkuchen、Krapfen。
source: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

reference: 咖喱饭菜是一道以香草和香料为主的菜肴，并配以肉类或蔬菜。
source: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.

reference: 咖喱饭菜既可以是“干”的，也可以是“湿”的，干湿情况取决于水量多少。
source: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.

reference: 在印度北部和巴基斯坦的内陆地区，咖喱中常常使用酸奶；而在印度南部和次大陆其他一些沿海地区，则常常使用椰奶。
source: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.

reference: 印度尼西亚有 17,000 个岛屿，因此印尼菜只是一个统称，它涵盖了全国各种各样的地方菜系。
source: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.

reference: 但如果没有更多修饰语，这个词往往指的是原产于主岛爪哇岛中部和东部地区的食物。
source: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.

reference: 现在，群岛上到处都能吃到爪哇菜，其中有多款调味方法简单的菜品，而爪哇人喜欢的主要调味料有花生、辣椒、糖（尤其是爪哇椰子糖）和各种香辛料。
source: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

reference: 马镫悬挂在马鞍两侧，用来支撑骑手的双脚。
source: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.

reference: 它们为骑手提供了更好的稳定性，但也有安全隐患，因为骑手的脚可能会卡住。
source: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.

reference: 如果骑手从马上被甩下来，但有一只脚卡在马镫上，那么马在奔跑时可能会拖着他走。为了将这种风险降至最低，可以采取一些预防措施。
source: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.

reference: 首先，大多数骑马人会穿带跟马靴，而且鞋底光滑及相当狭窄。
source: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.

reference: 其次，一些马鞍——尤其是英式马鞍——配有安全扣，如果落马的骑手向后拉，马镫皮带就会从马鞍上掉下来。
source: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

reference: 智利首选登山目的地科茶莫山谷 (Cochamó Valley) 被称为南美洲的优胜美地 (Yosemite)，这里有各式各样的花岗岩大石壁和峭壁。
source: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.

reference: 从山峰望去有着令人惊叹的壮丽景色。 来自世界各地的登山者在其绵延不断可作为攀援墙的峭壁上不断开拓新路线。
source: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

reference: 高山滑雪运动包括普通滑雪和雪板滑雪，是非常受欢迎的运动，在这项运动中，滑雪板或滑雪单板会固定在您的双脚上，从白雪覆盖的地形上滑下来。
source: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.

reference: 滑雪是许多滑雪爱好者的主要旅游活动，这些爱好者有时也被称为“滑雪狂人”，他们计划整个假期都在某个地点滑雪。
source: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.

reference: 滑雪这个想法由来已久——绘有滑雪者的洞穴壁画，年份可以追溯到公元前 5000 年！
source: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!

reference: 作为一项运动，高山滑雪至少可以追溯到 17 世纪，1861年，挪威人在澳大利亚开设了第一家休闲滑雪俱乐部。
source: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.

reference: 滑雪自由行：这项活动也叫越野滑雪、滑雪旅游或滑雪远足。
source: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.

reference: 这项活动与阿尔卑斯式滑雪旅行或登山运动相关，但通常不会进行这两项活动。这两项活动要在陡峭的地形上进行，而且需要更硬的滑雪板和靴子。
source: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.

reference: 把滑雪路线想象成类似的徒步路线。
source: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.

reference: 条件良好的时候，你可以比步行走得更远——但只有在极少数情况下，你才能获得与不背着沉重背包、在平整的轨道上越野滑雪相同的速度。
source: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

reference: 欧洲是片面积相对较小但有着许多独立国家的大陆。在通常情况下，穿越多个国家旅行意味着必须多次经历签证申请和护照检查。
source: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.

reference: 然而在这方面，申根区有点像一个国家。
source: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.

reference: 只要你在此区域居留，通常可以直接通过边境，无需再次接受护照检查点的检查。
source: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.

reference: 同理，有了申根签证，你就不必分别向每个申根成员国申请签证，从而节省了时间、金钱和手续。
source: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

reference: 对于哪些加工物品是古董，没有统一的定义。一些税务机构将 100 年以上的物品定义为古董。
source: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.

reference: 该定义存在地域差异，北美洲等地的年份限制可能比欧洲短。
source: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.

reference: 手工艺品可能会被定义为古董，尽管相比于批量生产的同类产品，手工艺品的年份要短得多。
source: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.

reference: 驯鹿饲养是萨米人的一项重要生计。围绕该行业的文化对许多以其他职业为生的人也很重要。
source: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.

reference: 不过，即使从传统意义上出发，并非所有的萨米人都参与了大规模的驯鹿饲养业，他们会以捕鱼、狩猎及类似活动为生，并通常将驯鹿当作役畜。
source: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.

reference: 如今很多萨米人投身于现代行业。旅游业是萨普米，也就是萨米地区的一大收入来源。
source: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.

reference: 尽管“吉普赛”一词应用广泛，尤其在非罗姆人当中更为盛行，但它通常被认为是一种冒犯，因为它与负面的刻板印象和对罗姆人错误的看法相关联。
source: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.

reference: 如果你要访问的国家受到旅行警告的约束，你的旅行健康保险或旅行取消保险可能会受到影响。
source: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.

reference: 你也可以咨询除贵国以外其他政府的建议，但他们的建议是为他们的公民而制定的。
source: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.

reference: 例如，中东地区的美国公民可能面临与欧洲人或阿拉伯人的不同境遇。
source: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.

reference: 旅游警示只能就当地局势提供简略摘要。
source: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.

reference: 与其他地方提供的更详细的信息相比，这里所提供的建议往往较为粗略、笼统且过于简单。
source: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

reference: 恶劣天气是任何危险天气现象的总称；这种天气会造成破坏、严重社会混乱或人员伤亡。
source: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.

reference: 世界上任何地方都可能发生恶劣天气。恶劣天气有各种不同类型，具体取决于地理位置、地形和大气条件。
source: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.

reference: 狂风、冰雹、过量降水、山火，还有雷雨、龙卷风、水龙卷、气旋，都是极端天气的表现和影响。
source: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.

reference: 区域性和季节性的恶劣天气现象包括暴风雪、雪暴、冰暴和沙尘暴等。
source: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.

reference: 强烈建议旅客注意所在地的恶劣天气风险，它们可能会影响旅行计划。
source: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.

reference: 任何计划前往可能被认为战区国家之人，都应该接受专业训练。
source: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.

reference: 在互联网上搜索“应对敌对环境课程”，也许能找到提供培训的当地公司的地址。
source: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.

reference: 这门课程通常会涵盖在此讨论到的所有问题，经常会以实战经验的方式加以深入。
source: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.

reference: 课程训练通常要持续 2-5 天，将涉及角色扮演、急救方式训练，有时也涉及武装训练。
source: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.

reference: 关于野外生存的书籍和杂志很常见，但关于战区生存的出版物却很少。
source: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

reference: 计划在国外做变性手术的旅行者务必在返程时携带有效证件。
source: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.

reference: 至于愿不愿意签发没有注明性别 (X) 的护照，或愿不愿为了符合想要的姓名和性别而更改文件，各国政府的意愿各不相同。
source: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.

reference: 外国政府对这些文件的认可程度也千差万别。
source: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.

reference: 在 2001 年 9 月 11 日之后的时代，安全检查站的搜查也变得更烦扰。
source: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.

reference: 尚未做手术的变性者在通过扫描仪时，不得不透露自己的隐私，并且无法保障自身尊严。
source: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.

reference: 离岸流是海浪从海滩快速回流到海中的回流，通常发生在暗礁或类似的地方。
source: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.

reference: 水下的地形造成回流集中于几处较深的区域，那里可能会形成流向深水的急流。
source: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.

reference: 大部分死亡都是因逆流而上、体力透支造成的，逆着水流游泳不太可能成功。
source: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.

reference: 摆脱湍急水流之后，游回来就没有那么困难了。
source: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.

reference: 努力游往你不会再次被困住的地方，或者等待救援（取决于你的技能以及你是否已被发现）。
source: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

reference: 重返家园的冲击比文化冲击来得更快（蜜月期更短），持续时间更长，也可能更严重。
source: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.

reference: 对于很容易适应新文化的旅行者来说，有时很难重新适应他们的本土文化。
source: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.

reference: 在国外生活了一段时间后回国，你会发现自己已经适应了新的文化，丢掉了一些家乡文化的习惯。
source: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.

reference: 当你刚出国时，人们可能会很有耐心，很体谅你，因为他们知道旅行者来到新国家需要适应。
source: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.

reference: 人们可能想不到，旅行者在回程中也需要耐心和理解。
source: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

reference: 对儿童来说，金字塔的声光表演是该地区最有趣的活动之一。
source: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.

reference: 你可以在黑暗中看到金字塔，在节目开始前你可以看到它们默默地在那里。
source: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.

reference: 平时你总能在这里听到游客和小摊贩的声音。声光交织，就像在讲述一个动人的故事。
source: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.

reference: 背景幕布上是狮身人面像，它也是长篇故事的讲述者。
source: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.

reference: 场景在金字塔上展示，不同的金字塔被点亮。
source: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.

reference: 南设得兰群岛（South Shetland Islands）发现于 1819 年。有几个国家声称拥有该群岛的主权，而且群岛拥有最多的基地，在 2020 年岛上有十六个基地处于使用状态。
source: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.

reference: 该群岛位于南极半岛以北 120 公里处。最大的岛屿是乔治国王岛，这里是“繁星村（Villa Las Estrellas）”的定居点。
source: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.

reference: 其他的包括利文斯顿岛和欺骗岛。在那里，一个仍然活跃的火山口被洪水淹没，提供了一个壮观的天然港口。
source: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.

reference: 埃尔斯沃思地 (Ellsworth Land) 位于该半岛的南部，面朝别林斯高晋海 (Bellingshausen Sea)。
source: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.

reference: 半岛上的山脉在这里并入高原，然后重新形成长达 360 公里的埃尔斯沃斯（Ellsworth）山脉，这座山脉被明尼苏达冰川一分为二。
source: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.

reference: 北部，或者说森蒂纳尔岭，拥有南极洲最高的山脉文森山脉，最高峰是 4892 米的文森峰。
source: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.

reference: 在手机信号覆盖不到的偏远地区，卫星电话可能是你的唯一选择。
source: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.

reference: 一般来说，卫星电话不能取代移动电话，因为只有在卫星信号畅通的室外，才能进行通话。
source: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.

reference: 该服务经常用于航运，包括游艇以及有远程数据和语音需求的探险。
source: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.

reference: 你当地的电话服务提供商应该能够提供关于连接到这项服务的详细信息。
source: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

reference: 对于那些计划怎么度过空档年的人来说，游学成为越来越受欢迎的选择。
source: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.

reference: 这在中学毕业生中尤其流行，他们可以在上大学前抽出一年的时间，又不影响他们接受教育。
source: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.

reference: 很多情况下，在国外参加间隔年课程可以实质上提升你回国升学的机会。
source: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.

reference: 通常情况下，参加这些教育类项目需要交学费。
source: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.

reference: 芬兰是绝佳的帆船运动圣地， 素有“千湖之乡”的美誉 ，在其湖泊和沿海群岛范围内也含有数千座岛屿。
source: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.

reference: 在群岛和湖泊之中，游艇并不是必需的。
source: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.

reference: 沿海群岛和最大的几个湖泊的大小足以容纳任何游艇，不过较小的船只甚至皮划艇能带来不同的体验。
source: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.

reference: 划船是芬兰的一项全国性消遣活动，每七八个人里就有一艘船。
source: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.

reference: 挪威、瑞典和新西兰也有类似的情况，但在其他方面很是独特（例如，在荷兰，这个数字是一比四十）。
source: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).

reference: 大多数典型的波罗的海游轮都会在俄罗斯圣彼得堡逗留较长时间。
source: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.

reference: 这意味着可以有好几天完整时间来参观这座历史悠久的城市，然后晚上回到船上睡觉。
source: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.

reference: 如果只是在乘船游览的情况下登岸，则不需要单独的签证（规定截至 2009 年）。
source: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).

reference: 有些邮轮在宣传手册上以德国柏林为亮点。正如从上面地图中看到的那样，柏林并没有靠近大海的地方，而且游船价格并不包括游览这座城市的费用。
source: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.

reference: 对于各个年龄和背景的人来说，乘飞机旅行都可能成为恐怖的经历，尤其是在以前从未乘坐过飞机或有过痛苦经历的情况下。
source: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.

reference: 这并不是丢人的事情：这和很多人对其他东西抱有的恐惧和厌恶没什么两样。
source: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.

reference: 对一些人来说，如果要克服因未知事物或不可控制的状况而产生的恐惧，了解飞机的工作原理和飞行的程序可能会有帮助。
source: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

reference: 快递公司可因快速交付货物而获取高酬劳。很多时候，时间对于商务文件、商品或用于紧急维修的零部件而言非常重要。
source: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.

reference: 在某些航线上，大型公司有自己的飞机，但对于其他航线和小公司来说，就有问题了。
source: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.

reference: 如果他们使用航空的方式运输货物，在某些航线上，可能要花几天的时间才能卸货和通关。
source: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.

reference: 最快的方法就是把它作为托运行李承运。根据航空公司规定，禁止载运未登机旅客的行李，而这时就需要你在场。
source: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

reference: 乘坐头等舱或商务舱最明显的方式是花一大笔钱来享受这种特权（或者，更好的方式是让你的公司给你出钱乘坐）。
source: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).

reference: 然而，这并不便宜：根据粗略估算，商务舱的票价可能是普通经济舱的 4 倍，头等舱的票价更是 11 倍之高！
source: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!

reference: 一般来说，从 A 地直飞 B 地，压根没必要去找商务舱或头等舱的打折机票。
source: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.

reference: 航空公司非常清楚，有一些核心乘客愿花高价获得快速、舒适出行的特权，因此航空公司会相应地收取费用。
source: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

reference: 摩尔多瓦的首都是基希讷乌。当地语言是罗马尼亚语，但俄语也被广泛使用。
source: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.

reference: 摩尔多瓦是一个多民族共和国，饱受民族冲突之苦。
source: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.

reference: 1994 年，这场冲突导致摩尔多瓦东部自诩为德涅斯特河沿岸共和国的成立。该共和国有自己的政府和货币，但没有得到任何联合国成员国的认可。
source: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.

reference: 尽管政治谈判失败，但摩尔多瓦这两个地区的经济联系得以重建。
source: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.

reference: 摩尔多瓦 (Moldova) 的主要宗教是东正教。
source: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

reference: 伊兹密尔是土耳其第三大城市，人口约 370 万，它是土耳其第二大港口，仅次于伊斯坦布尔，它也是一个繁忙的交通枢纽。
source: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.

reference: 曾经是士麦那 (Smyrna) 古城，如今已成为一个现代化、发达且繁忙的商业中心，周围是巨大的海湾和群山。
source: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.

reference: 在宽阔的林荫大道、玻璃外墙的建筑和现代化的购物中心之间，散布着传统的红瓦屋顶、18 世纪的市场以及古老的清真寺和教堂，不过这座城市比传统的土耳其更有地中海欧洲的氛围。
source: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

reference: 在哈尔达斯维克村 (Haldarsvík) 可以欣赏附近依斯特洛伊岛 (Eysturoy) 的美景。村中有一个与众不同的八角形教堂。
source: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.

reference: 教堂墓地里，一些坟墓上方摆着有趣的大理石鸽子雕塑。
source: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.

reference: 在这个迷人的村庄漫步半小时是值得的。
source: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

reference: 向北可轻松抵达浪漫迷人的辛特拉镇；它是拜伦勋爵笔下为人称道的乐土，并因此为外国人所熟知。
source: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.

reference: Scotturb 403 路公共汽车定期发车前往辛特拉 (Sintra)，在罗卡角停靠。
source: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.

reference: 也可以到北部参观法蒂玛圣母院（圣地），它是举世闻名的圣母玛丽亚显现之地。
source: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

reference: 请记住，你其实是在参观一个巨大的万人坑遗址，该遗址对世界上一大群体有着难以估量的意义。
source: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.

reference: 还是有许多男女在这里幸存了下来，他们如今仍然健在；而更多人的亲人，有的在那里被屠杀，有的一直做苦工到死，犹太人和非犹太人都是如此。
source: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.

reference: 请给予此地应得的尊严、庄严和尊重。不要用大屠杀或纳粹开玩笑。
source: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.

reference: 切勿在建筑物上做标记或涂鸦，以免破坏遗址。
source: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

reference: 巴塞罗那的官方语言为加泰罗尼亚语和西班牙语。大约一半的当地人更愿意说加泰罗尼亚语，绝大多数人都听懂加泰罗尼亚语，至于西班牙语，几乎每个人都能听懂。
source: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.

reference: 然而，大多数指示牌都只使用加泰罗尼亚语，因为这是法律规定的第一官方语言。
source: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.

reference: 然而，公共交通和其他设施也广泛使用西班牙语。
source: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.

reference: 地铁里的定期广播只有加泰罗尼亚语，但自动系统会用多种语言进行临时广播，包括西班牙语、英语、法语、阿拉伯语和日语。
source: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

reference: 巴黎人是出了名的以自我中心、粗鲁和傲慢。
source: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.

reference: 虽然这通常只是一种不准确的刻板印象，但在巴黎生活的最佳方式仍然是尽量举止得当，表现得像一个有 “bien élevé”（教养良好）的人。这会让参加社会活动变得容易得多。
source: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.

reference: 如果你表现出一点基本的礼貌，巴黎人粗鲁的表现很快就会消失无踪。
source: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.

reference: 普利特维茨湖国家公园森林茂密，主要树种有山毛榉、云杉和冷杉，并以高山和地中海植被混合为特色。
source: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.

reference: 由于小气候、土壤和海拔高度的多样性，这里的植物群落种类非常丰富，并因此闻名于世。
source: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.

reference: 该地区也是各类动物和鸟类的家园。
source: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.

reference: 在那里可以看到欧洲棕熊、狼、鹰、猫头鹰、猞猁、野猫和松鸡等稀有动物以及许多更常见的物种
source: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

reference: 女性在参观修道院时必须穿裙子，裙子必须及膝，肩膀也要覆盖住。
source: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.

reference: 大多数修道院都会为没有准备的女性提供裹身衣，但如果你自己带，尤其是颜色鲜艳的，门口的修道士会向你投来抿嘴一笑。
source: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.

reference: 同理，男士也必须穿着长裤，遮住膝盖。
source: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.

reference: 也可以从入口处的存衣柜借到，但衣服并不是每次有人穿过后都会洗，所以这些裙子穿起来可能会有点不舒服。全部都是均码哦!
source: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

reference: 马略卡岛的菜肴和地中海相似地区的菜肴一样，主要以面包、蔬菜和肉类（尤其是猪肉）为基础，而且完全使用橄榄油。
source: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.

reference: Pa amb Oli 是一种在夏天尤为流行的简单晚餐：面包搭配橄榄油、番茄，手头上任何佐料都可加入，比如奶酪、金枪鱼等。
source: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

reference: 除去表示您的“Sie”之外的所有名词都应以大写字母开头，即使在句子中间也应如此。
source: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.

reference: 这是区分某些动词和宾语的一个重要方法。
source: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.

reference: 这也可以让阅读更轻松，尽管这在一定程度上使书写变得复杂，因为你需要判断动词或形容词是否被用作一种名词化的形式。
source: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

reference: 意大利语的发音相对容易，因为大多数单词的发音与拼写完全相同
source: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written

reference: 需要注意的主要字母是 c 和 g，因为它们的发音是根据以下元音变化的。
source: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.

reference: 另外，需要确保对 r 和 rr 采取不同的发音： “caro“ 的意思是”亲爱的“，而 “carro” 的意思则是“双轮战车”。
source: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

reference: 波斯语的语法大多相对简单，有规律可循。
source: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.

reference: 因此，阅读这本语法入门书能帮助你掌握更多波斯语语法，更好地理解短语。
source: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.

reference: 毋庸置疑的是，如果你会讲一门罗曼语，那么学习葡萄牙语会更加容易。
source: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.

reference: 然而，懂一点西班牙语的人可能会急着得出这样的结论：葡萄牙语与西班牙语非常接近，不需要单独学习。
source: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.

reference: 如今，前现代的天文台大多已经被淘汰，只作为博物馆或教育场所保留了下来。
source: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.

reference: 由于在其全盛时期的光污染还不像现在这么严重，所以天文台通常建立在城区或校园内，比现代修建的天文台更容易到达。
source: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.

reference: 大多数现代科研望远镜都是巨型设施，位于大气条件优良的偏远地区。
source: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

reference: 赏樱，亦称“花见”（hanami），从 8 世纪开始就成为了日本习俗。
source: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.

reference: 这一概念来自中国，梅花是中国人喜闻乐见的一种花卉。
source: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.

reference: 在日本，最早的樱花派对是由天皇为他自己和皇室其他贵族成员在皇家御所举办的。
source: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

reference: 植物在自然环境中状态最好。因此要抵住诱惑，不去摘掉植物，哪怕“只是一株”。
source: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.

reference: 如果参观的是精心布置的园林，收集“标本”也会被驱逐，没有商量余地。
source: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.

reference: 通常来讲，新加坡是一个非常安全的地方，导航也很容易。到达后你几乎可以买到任何东西。
source: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.

reference: 但由于处在赤道以北几度的“高热带”，你将需要同时应对高温（终年）和强烈的阳光（天气晴朗时，这种情况相对较少）。
source: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).

reference: 有几辆巴士也向北开往希伯伦，那里是《圣经》中的族长亚伯拉罕、以撒、雅各和他们妻子的传统墓地。
source: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.

reference: 请确认你打算乘坐的公交车将会进入希伯伦，而不仅仅是去附近的基亚特·阿巴 (Kiryat Arba) 犹太定居点。
source: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.

reference: 内陆水道可以作为假期游玩的一个不错的主题。
source: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.

reference: 例如，在卢瓦尔河谷和莱茵河谷参观城堡，或者乘游轮去游览多瑙河沿岸好玩的城市，或者沿伊利运河乘船游玩。
source: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.

reference: 它们还为热门的徒步和自行车骑行路径明确了路线。
source: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

topic: Reason to travel/Christmas and New Year
reference: 圣诞节是基督教最重要的节日之一，是为了庆祝基督诞辰而设立的。
source: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.

topic: Reason to travel/Christmas and New Year
reference: 与这个节日有关的许多传统也被基督教国家的非信徒和世界各地的非基督徒所接受。
source: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.

reference: 有个传统是在复活节之夜在户外某处醒着看日出。
source: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.

reference: 当然，这个传统有其基督教神学的解释，但它很可能是基督诞生以前就存在的一种庆祝春天、祈求丰收的仪式。
source: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.

reference: 更传统的教堂常常在复活节周末的周六晚上举行复活节守夜活动，会众通常在午夜钟声敲响之时涌入庆典，庆祝基督的复活。
source: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

reference: 最初，动物们都是通过游泳、飞行或者漂浮的方式到达了这些岛屿。
source: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.

reference: 因为远离大陆，哺乳动物无法长途跋涉而来，使得巨龟成为科隆群岛主要的食草动物。
source: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.

reference: 人类来到加拉帕戈斯群岛后，引进了许多哺乳动物，其中包括山羊、马、牛、老鼠、猫和狗。
source: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.

reference: 如果冬季去北极或南极地区旅游，你就能体验到极夜，即一段时间内太阳不会从地平线上升起。
source: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.

reference: 这提供了一个可以看到北极光的绝佳机会，因为天空将或多或少连续一整天都是暗的。
source: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.

reference: 这些地区人口稀少，一般不存在光污染的问题，你也能欣赏到璀璨星空。
source: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

reference: 与西方人习惯的工作文化相比，日本人的工作文化中等级制度更明显，更加正式。
source: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.

reference: 西装是标准的商务着装，同事们用彼此的姓氏或职称来互相称呼。
source: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.

reference: 和谐的职场氛围至关重要，强调团队的努力，而不是表扬个人成就。
source: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.

reference: 员工在做任何决定时都必须得到上级的批准，并需要无条件服从上级的指示。
source: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
